title: LEADer:Free CRM, Customers, Leads & Sales Tracking
description:
üìä Grow your business with LEADer CRM app on the go personal CRM & Sales tracking app for Free!
LEADer's features include tasks, a digital business card, reminders, leads tracker, clients tracker, customers & leads comments, notes, meetings, smart business calendar, tasks, price quote, follow ups, customer tags, quick search, online metrics, events, customer database and more.
LEADer CRM will automatically capture & track incoming phone calls from new leads until closing a deal
LEADer sales CRM is very intuitive and a must-have app designed for every salesperson, self-employed, freelancer, or small business owners (Realtors / real estate brokers / consultants, salespersons etc.). LEADer personal CRM helps to manage customer database, grow and increase sales because of the smart algorithm and unique features that will ease your work and improve it ‚Äì and it‚Äôs all with ONE TAP!
üìä Update offline records ,tasks, notes, customer info and database, reminders, contacts, tags, price quotes and business appointments fast & easily in real-time while the deals are still fresh in your mind! - Track & Close more deals on the go! carry your sales data with you everywhere you go. Even if you are offline.
üìä CRM (Customer or Client Relationship Management) is the most important aspect in business sales and marketing for salesmen & Rep. According to various researches & studies, a potential lead, prospect or e-leads who initiates a contact to purchase your product or service is 82% more likely to close a deal with a business, rep, salesperson or freelancer who calls them back first?!. Stay in touch with prospects. That‚Äôs why we consider it the utmost importance that we begin the work starting from when a potential customer, prospect, e-lead or lead contact you! This feature makes LEADer unique compared to many CRM apps or Sales Tracker and business software out there even offline - when you are in the office or mostly out of office . Our main focus as a business app or sales pipeline tracker is to help you grow, manage client relationships & increase sales. Manage your customers and sales with access to records of leads, potentials, prospects, customers, contacts, tasks, reminders, quotation form, tags, events and notes by access or modify customer information offline. LEADer helps you stay productive and use your database whenever you are. Communicate more efficiently with your customers, and help you grow your business.

üìä LEADer CRM increases customer satisfaction & customer engagement üìä

üìä LEADer sales rep CRM is the sales tracking app you always wanted. By streamlining your contacts and sales into a simple, easy to use, sales pipeline, LEADer CRM makes managing your business easy. LEADer CRM call tracker proved to be the ultimate selling and CRM tool to support salesman, freelancers and self-employed working in field sales & services. The combination of lead manager and easy sales leads capture provides field sales reps with the ultimate sales tracker. Regardless if your domain is inside or outside sales, this selling tool will make you and your companies reach a new level of productivity.

üìä LEADer salesmen CRM is the management & sales business all in one app designed for ease of use and reliability. It is used daily by thousands of self‚Äìemployed, freelance & sales reps, sales managers and business owners worldwide.
üìä Regardless of your role, whether it's a sales rep, sales leader, salesman or business owner, LEADer rep CRM will be uncontested in customer management, sales tracking, and helping you to be more productive and grow your business.
LEADer sales app is a CRM app that helps, professionals, freelancers, small business, realtors  and salesmen to track, acquire, retain and delight more customers /clients by smart features:  digital business card, reminders, tracking Prospects, tracking clients, customers & leads comments, notes, meetings, business calendar, tasks, Price quote, follow-ups, reminders, events and many more.

recentChanges:
- Manage & Follow up Customers & leads via CRM.
- Visualize Your Leads, Customers & Closing Deals metrics!
- Manage Customer/Lead Info During Call.
- Automatically Send Business Card to Leads & customers.
- Price quotes.
- Tasks, reminders, follow-ups & your TO-DO calendar.

comments: Best free CRM app out there. The integration of all information into one place is a time saver for small businesses whose owners generally have to be secretary, salesperson, accountant in their off time while doing the work during the day. I recommend this app to anyone who needs to streamline their process.

LOVE THE APp..Its very efficient with keeping up with customers and scheduling task... The only thing keeping it from being a 5star is not being able to view tasks itemized per day.. .. When you click task, all your task show up running together until there marked completed, without the option seeing task only for a certain day..... seems like a small fix ... if they did that, I would make it 5star.... still great app though and worth the purchase

I have used many CRM tools for Marketing, sales, and advertising jobs. I can truly say that LEADer CRM is by far the most advanced, integrated, and versatile tool in my arsenal. The interface is simple enough for beginners to use, yet advanced enough for veteran CRM users. Thanks to LEADer, I have increased my productivity and efficiency more than Corporately purchased CRM apps. Customer support is on point, there is no reason to use anything else. I am even able to use it for my personal life!

This app is awesome except you guys take way too long to make changes that you say that you're making like simply being able to add a picture, adding away to count up leads or tasks completed daily, weekly or monthly, or simply being able to go to someone's Facebook page or messenger right from the app. It's been at least 6 months since you said that you were going to add these features so it's frustrating that it takes so long!!! #STILL #WAITING

Best CRM App to grow business now a days. This will help you to kill competition by giving quick answer to customers. I have used since long time no error no hassle. Good support team for all our needs. I like Lead Call plugin so much. App remind me that which call is important due to app call plugin functionality.

title: Salesgasm: Free Marketing and Sales Training App
description:
The free sales training and marketing training app to always keep yourself updated on the latest techniques and tools in sales, digital Marketing and marketing. A very light app that is a must for all sales and marketing professionals in the world from Startups, SMEs and MNCs. 

- Are you getting a lot of objections from clients and don't know how to reply to convert the deal?
- Is your social media strategy working? If not, do you know the ways you can dominate social media?
- Have you ever got stuck before replying to a client as you don't know what to write in the email?
- Do you have a long list of leads in your CRM but none of them are close to conversion?
- Are you about to give a presentation on a high value deal to a client but do not know how to convince them, or what body language should you have to increase the chances of conversion?
- Are you spending too much on your marketing and want to know the ROI on marketing?

If the points above are something you are pondering, try downloading the Salesgasm app. Salesgasm is a free app for Sales training as well as Marketing training. It features videos, articles, webinars, sales motivation videos/articles and other training material from professional trainers/training companies from across the globe. The app can be used anywhere where there is an internet connection and the user gets access to high-quality sales and marketing training on the move.

Hand-Picked Training Material: The team at Salesgasm only adds data after confirming that it is the right sales and marketing training material for you

Powerful search: Salesgasm provides a very quick and powerful search to assist you in finding the exact videos/articles you are looking for. The sections have been divided into categories to make navigation easy and effective.

User-friendly: Simply open the app and click on the menu section. The app navigation is self-explanatory and comprehensive.

comments: The app does not work. I've downloaded yesterday and since then, it only shows "Gone Finishing" on the screen whenever I load the app up. I was really looking forward to using this app to help me to train more on overcoming objections, but there's nothing there, just a white screen that says "Gone Finishing". I am very disappointed since there is no other app I can find that does what this app is suppose to do for me.
Very informative to use as a learning tool

This app is astonishing, very informative, I loved the training tab it has many good topics that is needed in real life for businesses. Also the approach is practical and needs little time from your day.
lots of invaluable information, not only for sales, it covers so many aspects of business and entrepreneurship and its free. I would have paid for this app without hesitation.
Great app, lots of useful information for both sales and marketing

title: Be a sales superstar by Brian Tracy
description:
Brian Tracy shares the most important principles for sales success he has discovered in 30 years of training more than a half million sales professionals in 23 countries.

Based on Tracy‚Äôs detailed discussions with top salespeople and his keen observation of their methods, as well as his own experiences as a record-breaking salesman, these guidelines address both the inner game of selling‚Äîthe mental component‚Äîand the outer game of selling‚Äîthe methods and techniques of actually making the sale.

Concise and action-oriented, Be a Sales Superstar is a handbook for busy sales professionals, providing key ideas and techniques that will immediately increase your effectiveness and boost your results.

Brian Tracy shows you how to:

‚Ä¢ Get more and better appointments, easier;
‚Ä¢ Build high rapport in the first few minutes;
‚Ä¢ Make better, more effective sales presentations
‚Ä¢ Close more sales faster than ever before

Apply Tracy‚Äôs 21 great ways to be a superstar salesperson, and your success in selling will become unlimited.

comments: The app really provides deep insight into the sales world. It really really teaches the very pillars of being a great salesman . I would highly recommend this to everyone trying to make a career in sales.
I love it, It uses a simple language which anyone who understands english can easily read and understand. The book itself is an engine room in sales

Excellent advice from one of the best! It has everything you need to change your sales career into a joyfully prosperous experience everyday, every close. But just like the other books you've read... it only works if YOU apply it! Bring the Joy!
Simple and well explanatory to understand. I love it! It is practicable
Really good and that too without advertisement.. And it will gives you a complete knowledge about high roller...

title: DealerSocket Sales
description:
Brought to you by the software ninjas at DealerSocket, you can bring the power of our industry-leading CRM to your fingertips. Manage your key daily activities 24/7 with this user-friendly App.

Features and capabilities:
‚Ä¢ Access sales opportunities and daily work plans 24/7
‚Ä¢ Quickly create sales opportunities with customers anytime, anywhere
‚Ä¢ Always be on top of lead alerts
‚Ä¢ Search and manage your inventory
‚Ä¢ Use the mobile Sales Dashboard to manage your dealership 24/7
‚Ä¢ Add vehicle trades and directly push deals to your DMS in seconds
‚Ä¢ Leave the computer at home! Communicate with customers via phone, email and text from your mobile device!
‚Ä¢ Receive notifications about urgent CRM tasks
‚Ä¢ Send CRM forms from your device to wireless printers

recentChanges:
Improved attaching videos to email for Android 10 users.
Improved our drivers license and VIN scan tools.
Fixed an issue with new SocketTalk messages showing under the wrong customer.
comments: I'm at 1 star, you have to understand I never give 1 star ratings. This app deserves it though and here's why; there are some specific features that if they worked would make this app awesome 1. You can send videos via email ( you actually can not, it will crash the app and loose the contents of the email. 2. You can scan and save drivers licenses ( no it crashes and you loose all customer info so make sure you write it down before you hit save! 3. There's more but they cut me short at 500 char

Could definitely use improvement. Website works better on mobile just need drivers license scanner. And that is crashing now with Android 10. Crashes as soon as you hit save and I keep losing information that we get from customers. Please fix üôèüèΩ

Its pretty bad with android and not much better with apple. But I use android only now. It won't make calls through the app and everything you click on takes secends to react. Afyer a sale you cannot recall stock nimber or vin number through the app. You have to get on a cpi to find that info. Theres so many things missing on this app. I could go on and on. Its bearable but really because we don't have a choice.
New android update doesn't allow the app to work properly. DL scanner crashes every single time.
Driver's license scanner has failed since android 10 update. My dealership requires this and it very much inconveniences my day, more so then blackbird which is equally as terrible as this app.

title: OfferUp - Buy. Sell. Offer Up
description:
Buy. Sell. Simple.

Join the largest mobile marketplace for local buyers and sellers! 

OfferUp makes it easy to find great deals on the things you want and make money on the things you want to sell. Ditch the Classified Ads and garage sales -- this is the best way to buy and sell in your community or neighborhood with people you can trust.

How it works:

‚Ä¢ Buy or sell anything; easily offer up your items for sale in 30 seconds. 
‚Ä¢ Find great deals and discounts on clothes, shoes, furniture, cell phones, electronics, baby & kids items, sports equipment, used cars, home goods and more.
‚Ä¢ Use reputation features like ratings and profiles to see who you‚Äôre dealing with and build trust. 
‚Ä¢ Shop local items for sale with thousands of new postings daily. 
‚Ä¢ Message buyers and sellers securely from within the app. 
‚Ä¢ Build your reputation with your unique seller profile page. 
‚Ä¢ Browse items by image and sort by category or location. 
‚Ä¢ Join millions of people using OfferUp across the country. 
‚Ä¢ Skip the garage sale! OfferUp is the simplest way to buy and sell locally.

Fun facts about OfferUp:

1. With OfferUp you can easily sell anything like clothes and shoes, used cars, electronics and home goods.
2. OfferUp shows you what‚Äôs selling nearby, right in your neighborhood. 
3. Communication between buyers & sellers happens through the app via secure messaging.
4. OfferUp is better than a garage sale; shop anything you want at a discount, right on your phone or tablet.

Be part of the community: 

We‚Äôre making local buying and selling an experience that everyone can try and trust. The community at the heart of our marketplace is what makes that possible. When you join OfferUp, you‚Äôre joining millions of people helping each other make money and save money around the nation -- and right in the neighborhood.

developerAddress:
OfferUp Inc.
227 Bellevue Way NE #57
Bellevue, WA 98004
recentChanges:
Enhanced user experience and stability.

Thanks for using OfferUp and keep the feedback coming!
You can contact us by going to the Help Center in the app or on the web.
comments: Update: app sucks. When not let me in and keeps giving me an error code. So tired of this inconsistency and being locked out. SNAP!! it locks you out of your messages and then asks you to register as if you don't have an account. I've only been using this for about six months and it's already happened three times. Can't reply to people's messages. Missed sales. very frustrating. Not sure why they aren't fixing this problem because according to other people it's been going on a long time

No support on bugs at all. I do not get audio notifications for items I'm selling. example: a person messages me wanting to buy an item, I see it FOUR HOURS later. response .metrics/times are way up to an hour because of this bug. could have lost the sale and look like a clown for not responding when OFFERUP NEVER NOTIFIED ME. What's up guys? This sucks. Update: There literally is NO support. Just random comments trying to look like they are actively doing something. they definitely aren't

The app works well for the most part and does have some consistently great deals. After their last update I had to reinstall the app in order to do a new post, which has me a bit concerned on their regression testing process. Just an annoyance, I would still recommend folks trying it out.

Seems like it could have been a good marketplace with good deals but you can't actually buy anything. Sellers just never respond to even full price offers or worse accept then cancel the sale. Days or even weeks wasted. Unreliable or inactive sellers/listings need to be removed. Too frustrating as is, uninstalled.

OfferUp used to be so good. Now it's riddled with bugs, scams, and overall just a terrible experience. For the past year I've been unable to post from mobile data and now I can't log in. No way to contact support, not that they do anything anyway. Time to ditch OfferUp and find a better app to sell on.

title: Salesmate - Sales CRM
description:
Salesmate for Android is an easy to use sales CRM app for tracking every sales activity on the go.

Get complete control over your sales results by focusing on right contacts that are critical for business growth. Manage all your sales activities with Salesmate CRM ‚Äì a complete sales tool. Seamlessly integrate with G-suite and other apps that you are already using.

With Salesmate mobile CRM, it‚Äôs simple to streamline your sales process and close more leads faster. All-in-one sales app for sales pipeline management, automation, and acceleration. If you need a CRM to streamline your sales process then give Salesmate a try. We are a simple and easy CRM that your sales team will love to use.

Sales Management Made Easy with Salesmate CRM

- Respond to inbound leads from your website inside of our Salesmate CRM app
- Add contacts and notes on the go for future sales calls & meetings
- Monitor your sales pipeline and keep track of pipeline volume and velocity
- Add, manage, and track products inside Salesmate CRM. Track everything you sell. 
- Manage activities, deals, team, tasks, and emails at one place
- CRM for Google Apps- Syncs with Gmail, Calendar and Google Drive
- Seamlessly collaborate and provide better customer experience with shared team inbox
- Experience real-time integration with your favorite apps including Zapier, Wufoo, Clearbit
- Centralized location for of all your notes, activities, contacts, deals and reports across the mobile
- Automatic activity reminders based on action triggers

Mobile App Features Highlights 

Experience Mobility: Access anything, anytime and build more relationships with 360-degree view of your customer in our robust CRM.

Contacts Import: Import business contacts from Google contacts, phonebook or excel sheet. All your customers and prospects are now available at your fingertips. Use our CRM to stay organized!

Locate in Google Maps: Geolocation helps you to get the map view of clients within a stipulated range. Filter and search contacts up to 100-mile radius.

Email Sync: Send emails from either Salesmate or your email client and find those emails in the Sent folder of the app. Save your time and experience seamless communication from wherever you are.

Team Inbox: Seamlessly collaborate and provide better customer experience with shared team inbox

G-Suite Integration: Seamlessly integrate with Gmail, Google Calendar, Google Contacts, and Drive and access your data in the tools that you are already using for your sales. Finally, a CRM that can connect with all of your Google App products!

Push Notifications: Stay updated and react quickly with Push Notifications and app alerts.

Advanced Dashboard: Get all the valuable insights from the dashboard. Measure your productivity and take quick actions from advanced sales dashboard.

Sales Reporting: Get real-time control over your sales activity and check how your team is pacing `towards goals. Increase visibility and overall productivity.

Actionable Insights: Keep a tab on the pulse of your sales results with detailed reports.

Sales Pipeline: Quickly check your deal status and manage seamlessly with the sales pipeline. 

Timeline: Get all the past conversation at one place and take future actions with timeline feature.

Email template, tracking and scheduling: Easily track and schedule your sales emails. Make templates from your best-performing emails.
 
Track, record and log call - Automatically track and log your sales calls for better conversation.

Text SMS and MMS - Sent, Scheduled and received the SMS and MMS within the app by using the inbuild Calling service. 

Note: A Salesmate account is required to log into the Salesmate Mobile App and use our CRM. Don't have a Salesmate account? Go to https://app.salesmate.io/registration.html and sign up. 
For further queries reach out on support@salesmate.io

Advanced Dashboard: Get all the valuable insights from the dashboard. Measure your productivity and take quick actions from advanced sales dashboard.

Sales Reporting: Get real-time control over your sales activity and check how your team is pacing `towards goals. Increase visibility and overall productivity.

Actionable Insights: Keep a tab on the pulse of your sales results with detailed reports.

Sales Pipeline: Quickly check your deal status and manage seamlessly with the sales pipeline.

Timeline: Get all the past conversation at one place and take future actions with timeline feature.

Email template, tracking and scheduling: Easily track and schedule your sales emails. Make templates from your best-performing emails.

Track, record and log call - Automatically track and log your sales calls for better conversation.

Text SMS and MMS - Sent, Scheduled and received the SMS and MMS within the app by using the inbuild Calling service.

Note: A Salesmate account is required to log into the Salesmate Mobile App and use our CRM. Don't have a Salesmate account? Go to https://app.salesmate.io/registration.html and sign up.
For further queries reach out on support@salesmate.io
summary: Salesmate is an all in one sales CRM to that small teams love to use.

In this version, We have improved the call logging service.
Bug fixes.

title: ‚ÄãZendesk Sell - CRM, Leads and Sales Tracker
description:
Your go-to CRM app for everything sales. 

Zendesk Sell is a sales productivity platform that blends usability and intelligence to give you a cutting edge mobile sales experience. Sell covers your CRM needs on-the-go while boosting mobile sales productivity with features like communication tracking, email templates with view notifications, geolocation and mobile reporting.

Zendesk Sell was formerly called Base CRM.

Zendesk Sell is more than just a mobile sales and CRM app, it's an all-in-one solution that includes: customer management, sales tracker, sales pipeline, automatic sales communication tracker, task manager and calendar. Sell is remarkably easy to use CRM, but underneath it's an extremely powerful sales app.

We built the CRM with salespeople in mind so whether you‚Äôre a sales rep making calls, a manager monitoring pipeline and forecast, or a business owner growing your book of business, you‚Äôll approach a more efficient and effective workday with the Zendesk Sell mobile crm.

With a highly usable interface, offline access, and the ability to sync across all of your devices including the web application (i.e. desktop/computer), Sell is the perfect CRM for effectively managing your sales team.

Sell proved to be the ultimate selling tool to support salesman working in field sales. The combination of map with geolocation, lead manager and easy sales leads capture provides field sales reps with the ultimate sales software. For inside or outside sales, this selling tool will make you and your company reach the new level of productivity.

Qualify leads, and organize your sales process into a streamlined sales pipeline. Set up meetings, send emails, text messages and make calls all from within this mobile sales app. Never again miss an important detail about your customer, as all the communication history is organized into a neat timeline.

Create tasks, organize sales calendar, follow up on meetings - all from your Android phone or tablet. Let Sell automatically track calls, emails and text messages. Then watch as all of your actions are instantly synced with the Sell web app at getbase.com. The next generation mobile sales app allows you to easily capture information during or after meetings and carry your sales data with you everywhere you go. Even if you are offline.

Sell for Android is 100% free. However, the web version is limited to a 14-day trial with pricing starting at $19/month.

Sell is the sales app designed specifically for ease of use and reliability. It is used daily by thousands of sales reps, sales managers and business owners world wide.

Regardless if your a sales rep, sales leader or business owner, Sell will be uncontested in customer management, sales tracking, and helping you and your team be more productive.

EASY CRM AND SALES MANAGEMENT

With a highly usable interface, offline access, and the ability to sync across all of your devices including the web application (i.e. desktop/computer), Sell is the perfect tool for effectively managing your sales team.

Features:
* Lead management and customer management
* Tracking opportunities in sales pipeline
* Automatically track sales calls and texts, and log calls and SMS in the system
* Track emails and associate them with sales leads and customers
* Use Geolocation to map customers and sales opportunities
* Sync all of notes, contacts and deals across the computers and devices you use
* Capture leads or contacts while you‚Äôre on the go and manage them through sales pipeline
* Add tasks and reminders so you always remember to follow up
* See the latest updates from colleagues and collaborate with every sales rep in the sales team
* Native tablet app

This application uses Google Analytics to anonymously track usage data within the application.

Enjoying our app? Login to your Sell account from https://zendesk.com/sell/login to start a free 14-day web trial and check out web-only features that take sales productivity to a new level.

Happy Selling!

title: Estate Sales
description:
Welcome to the EstateSales.NET dedicated sale finder app! You can use our app to quickly and easily locate and keep up-to-date on estate/tag sales, auctions, moving sales, and other types of estate liquidations in your area while out and about.

Speed up your search!
Quickly access thousands of sales nationwide each month with our dedicated app.
Simply search using your location or with your zip code and immediately see sales in your area.
Jump straight to GPS-located driving directions from your city‚Äôs sale map to route any ongoing sale!
Personalize your sale list using custom filtering options and our ‚ÄúFavorite Sales‚Äù feature!

Even though our app is new, EstateSales.NET has been around in a nationwide capacity since 2002. Our site became mobile friendly in 2013, but due to the growing demand for a faster, more scaled-down user experience, we‚Äôve developed the first version of our dedicated app. We‚Äôre thoroughly committed to making your estate sale hunt the most enjoyable it can possibly be, so please let us know what you think about our app! Contact our support team at support@estatesales.net to provide feedback or to ask for new features.

comments: Sentence using this app since 2016. It's always had the right directions pertinent information pertaining to the sales. Information regarding times of sale, directions, pictures and anything else they feel that the customer may need to know and it's very easy to use

Love this app. Loads quickly. Allows you to sort by distance and search by ZIP code or City. I love that I can see the pictures of goods for sale and that there is a link to my navigation. I don't even have to type in an address. Great app I would recommend üëç

I will recommend that the app makes it new adjustments, such as allowing us to block certain sellers and rate them, simply because we as consumers need to alert the community of bad behavior from these sellers. If the app can do that. I'll give it a 5 star.

title: Sales Manager
description:
The Sales Manager is a powerful tool for producing sales invoices in the field. It is a cloud based, multi-user client server system, and Vanguard Software provides various server options.

The client can run on an Android or iOS phone or tablet, and it also runs on Chromebooks. The apps are free. They are not trial versions, and they have no expiry date. They fully functional, though there are a number of paid extras. They can also be used as stand alone apps, though various restrictions apply.

The Sales Manager is faster and more accurate than traditional paper-based methods, and can handle large amounts of data. Invoices can be printed on a Wi-Fi printer, and barcodes can be scanned from any Android device with a built in camera. The salesman does not have to lug around a heavy laptop ‚Äì he only needs the phone that he already carries.

The Sales Manager is designed to run on just about any iPhone or Android phone, and can be used even on devices with small screens. It has a rich graphical user interface, which makes it easy to learn and to use. The application uses a highly scalable SQLite database, and all queries are indexed. It can handle large numbers of customers and products, with little or no loss of performance.

The Sales Manager can adapt to match most business situations, and automatically formats dates and prices according to the current locale. It also has a flexible business model that includes support for multiple price lists and variable tax rates. It can be used for returns and refunds, as well as invoices.

KEY FEATURES

‚Ä¢ Fast response to user input
‚Ä¢ Highly scalable database
‚Ä¢ Easy to learn
‚Ä¢ Simple user interface
‚Ä¢ Barcode scanning
‚Ä¢ Invoice printing
‚Ä¢ Web services
‚Ä¢ Multiple price lists
‚Ä¢ Variable tax rates

title: Yard Sale Treasure Map
description:
Chart your course to yard sale treasure!  Finding yard sales near you has never been more fun and easy!

Yard Sale Treasure Map is an app for accessing craigslist garage sales on mobile devices.  View your local yard sales in map or list format, view sale details and photos, get directions, and take advantage of advanced organizational and route planning features.

- Search by day, location, distance, and keyword
- Organize by color or by creating a sale route
- See Street View of the sale site before you visit
- Save time and gas by optimizing your sale route order
- Sync your sale route across all of your mobile devices
- Share your sale route with your friends
- Get directions to each sale as you shop

Want your sale to appear on this app?  Create a garage sale listing on craigslist.  We'll find you!  Don't wait until the last minute... post your sale as early as possible.

Are you having problems with this app?  Send an email to yardsaletreasuremap@gmail.com or start a dialog on Facebook.

The craigslist and associated trademark are owned by craigslist, Inc. and are being used under licensed permission from craigslist, Inc. for a limited purpose. www.craiglist.org

- Share your sale route with your friends
- Get directions to each sale as you shop

Want your sale to appear on this app? Create a garage sale listing on craigslist. We'll find you! Don't wait until the last minute... post your sale as early as possible.

Are you having problems with this app? Send an email to yardsaletreasuremap@gmail.com or start a dialog on Facebook.

The craigslist and associated trademark are owned by craigslist, Inc. and are being used under licensed permission from craigslist, Inc. for a limited purpose. www.craiglist.org
summary: The only yard sale app officially licensed by craigslist.  Find sales near you!
recentChanges:
* New ability to make the map dark (dark mode)
* Fixing a Notes feature crash... use the sale menu to add a note to a sale that only you can see
* Making the tutorial pictures BIGGER
* Making little bump vibrations when sales are added to the map (on supported devices)
* Lots of tiny fixes and improvements
comments: This app is AWESOME!!! It's super easy to use and I found 5 different Estate sales on last sat that I would've never of found unless for this app. Its awesome for not wasting your time because most of the Yard sales and Estate sale listings have pics of there highlighted items for sale and if pics aren't available the sales have typed list of what they're selling. I love it.

Besides the odd glitch that causes my phone to vibrate randomly for 60 seconds when I first open the app, it's now become very difficult to mark and manage my sales. Markers will share the same number or even erase themselves while I'm out traveling to them. I was using this pretty often but it's becoming too difficult to use these days (Moto Z)

I use this app every weekend! I love the new option of navigating to either the pin location or the address, and the extra pin colors. It still needs a "never again" feature, for the repeater sales that are crappy.
Love this app. We can see quickly where sales are, what's being sold and what the hours are.ü•∞

Thief after 3 years is making me pay for the app every year. I paid when it was a one time fee. Now I feel ripped off to have to pay again. If I new you could change to yearly I never would have gotten. Now app is junk. Greedy!

title: AppSales: Paid Apps Gone Free & On Sale
description:
AppSales offers an easy, convenient way to find and download the best apps and games on sale or free for a limited time. Personalize your experience with advanced filter options, monitor app prices and discover the latest sales and trending apps.

‚úî *NEW* Discover paid apps that are free for a limited time

Google recently made it possible for developers to make their paid apps available for free for a short time which wasn‚Äôt possible before. Our new ‚ÄúNow Free‚Äù tab highlights those deals so you can grab those apps while the offer lasts. 

‚úî App price monitoring has never been this easy!

Feature overview:
‚Ä¢ Modern, intuitive user interface (Material 2.0 Design)
‚Ä¢ Constantly updated list of sales
‚Ä¢ Get notified about the new best sales on the Google Play Store and apps gone free
‚Ä¢ Only the hottest apps, games, and wallpapers
‚Ä¢ A price history provides transparency, allowing you to compare prices over time as well
‚Ä¢ Dismiss apps you're not interested in
‚Ä¢ Search for your new favorite apps and add them to your Watchlist
‚Ä¢ Advanced filter options to personalize your experience
‚Ä¢ Sync your Watchlist across multiple Android devices
‚Ä¢ Share sales with your family and friends
‚Ä¢ Dark Theme / Night mode

‚úî Your Personal Watchlist
Add apps, games, and wallpapers to your personal Watchlist and receive a notification once the app goes on sale. 

‚úî Price History
A Price History lets you easily view the min, the max, and the average price during the last 60 days (360 for Premium user). Validate sales and detect price-patterns to save money by purchasing an app at the best time, usually during a price drop on the Google Play Store.

‚úî Watchlist Charts
Grouped into 3 sections (Last 48 hours, last 30 days and 1 Year) you can easily discover brand new trending apps or the most popular paid apps.

‚úî Advanced Filter Options
Use filters to personalize the list of sales by defining your minimum discount-, download-, watchcount- and rating threshold. You can also choose to hide apps with ads or in-app purchases.

‚úî Dismiss Apps
Dismiss apps you already own or you‚Äôre not interested in and they won‚Äôt show up the next time they are on sale.

‚úî Categories
Not interested in apps of certain categories (e.g. Games or Wallpapers)? No problem, you can disable notifications for specific categories or completely hide them from your sale list. 

‚úî Customizable Highlights Section
Set up filter, specify categories, blacklist certain app types and developers to get a list of sales you‚Äôre interested in.

Why Should I Download AppSales Best Apps On Sale? (tl;dr)
AppSales lets you discover the best apps and games on sale thanks to our advanced filter and customization options. Other functions, like a price monitor or Watchlist Charts, makes AppSales an all-in-one solution for apps gone free deals and offers.


Suggestions? Feedback? Leave us a comment or rating in the Google Play Store or contact us at: info@app-sales.net

Please note: Actual prices may vary depending on your location and currency.

comments: I like this app however missing sorting options(price or discount), group or filter to apps or games (if it is an option to do), discount tab shows 100% free ones as well which have separate tab. However still a better browsing experience than play store. Yes I found the filter on main tab which is pretty handy but it is far from ideal. Still a great app though.

I would like to have the option to receive notifications only about true free apps and games, and filter them for the most stared ones as well as the option to sort the apps by stars and by original price in order to filter the junk, unuseful apps. Noticed that not all of the apps on Google's Play store are searchable. Also, an AMOLED theme can never harm an app. I will update the review as soon as these crutial features get their way to the app and when you reply to me so I notice.

One of those very useful software applications in the apps store . I use it every day and it's quite addictive. I like the way you place your ads. Non obtrusive ethically placed ads. Now I'm using my phone like a Pro.!

Pre-Material dress-up was smooth/faster. Highlights- Now Free- Sales, bottom location, select option is close enough to Android navigation bar that it can be frustrating! "Material Design" bandwagon had done your app no favors.
The best app of its kind on Google Play. When I install others like this one I compare them to this one! Kudos to the developers for all of the $$ you have saved me!

title: Outfield - Outside Sales & Field Marketing CRM
description:
Managers:
Outfield makes it easy to discover valuable insights about your market, track + verify team activity, and communicate effortlessly across all your devices. Outfield is the top rated field sales & marketing solution.

Field Reps:
Outfield is the ultimate territory management solution. As a field rep you‚Äôre always on-the-go. Outfield is a quick and simple way to plan & optimize your driving routes, organize contacts & accounts, keep track of whereabouts, and collaborate with others. Whether your goal is to increase productivity, drive revenue, or manage your activities Outfield is your app.

Features

Market Insight
Too many companies make marketing decisions with little information about their market. You don't have to be one of them. With powerful analytics & reporting to support your field sales & marketing programs, Outfield provides valuable data around trends that are taking place in your market domains, ensuring that you‚Äôre making smarter business decisions.

Team Synergy
In management sometimes it‚Äôs difficult to stay on top of the activities of your field force. Outfield makes it easy to manage and view employee whereabouts, account notes + photos, nightly summaries, understand which markets are experiencing the most penetration, and much more. Now you can have peace of mind knowing how your field reps are executing.

Collaboration
No sifting through old email chains to find the information or contacts you want. Instead, provide feedback to activity photos, notes, visit updates, and reports instantly and effectively to increase the chances that set goals are reached. Collaborate, share best practices, events, results, and feedback with teammates to boost overall performance.

Territory Management
Account management should not be tedious and time consuming. Now managing your customers is made simple. You can quickly create visit activity, attach notes & photos, use custom forms for data collection, as well as maintain and access critical information about your buyers in a fashion that meets your workflow patterns.

Incredibly Intuitive
Why waste time with poorly designed apps when you can do more faster! Outfield is the fastest and most intuitive outside sales app, period. Marketing and sales reps can get started instantly, perform like pros, and make an impact in no time!

comments: The app seems ok but it's a fundamentally dishonest company behind it. They refuse to disclose pricing on their website or even when requested. They contact you within an hour or two of installing it trying to bully. They are relying on hooking you in during the trial period then trying to gouge you, so don't fall for it.

Amazing app! Solved all of my needs in the field, including efficiency in routing for drive time and even prospecting for new clients. Haven't experienced any bugs and when I did need help with some features on the app, I was able to call their customer support line and get someone on the phone immediately to assist!

I truly love this app. I had a rough go in the beginning and immediately got a phone call trying to understand the issue. Their customer support is phenomenal. I truly feel like my needs are important to them. I cannot even begin to describe how awesome Michael is to deal with! He is a gem!!!
Brilliant
Excellent

title: sales-i
description:
Want more time to do the things you love, rather than preparing for tomorrow‚Äôs 9am meeting? sales-i makes it easy to find valuable new sales opportunities and increase customer retention, directly from your Android device. sales-i saves you time and relieves pressure and being overworked.

How it works:

sales-i is a subscription-based service that feeds on your back-office data. It intelligently spots patterns in your customer‚Äôs behavior, the system then alerts your salespeople when this behavior changes, or if a customer isn‚Äôt buying a product that they should be, giving you easy-to-close opportunities on tap. This, combined with an integrated CRM system, gives you greater customer insight than ever before.

sales-i empowers you to:

- Instantly create detailed customer reports, saving you hours of work every week.

- Organize and access your daily calendar and sales pipeline from any Android device.

- Let Autopilot prepare for your sales meetings, provide a complete picture of sales history, opportunities and a powerful snapshot report ‚Äì all done while you get a good night‚Äôs sleep.

- View information in easy-to-read dashboards, graphs and charts.

- Access and upload customer documents directly to sales-i from your Android device.

- Action targeted sales and marketing campaigns that alert your sales people to valuable sales opportunities.

- Add, edit and delete notes and contact information on the go directly from your Android device.

Please be aware that sales-i is a subscription-based service, if you do not have an account with us, you will be unable to use our App.

comments: This app/ program is designed to effortful well for oss/csr but is time consuming and limited for css.
No more fingerprint login? Signing back in has become a nightmare if I fail to log out. It used to be so easy, now someone has decided it needs to be hard work, thanks guys.

love it, couldn't run my business without it.

Brilliant app, easy to use, gives me more time to sell, best crm/business

title: Sales & Deals - Target, CVS, Costco, Kroger

Browse thousands of discount coupons, weekly grocery ads and store flyers from retailers big and small for major savings from your favorite stores and supermarkets with Sales & Deals. üí∞

Save time, a whole lot of paper and up to 50% on your weekly shopping trips with this easy-to-use app. Take advantage of all the savings with every single weekly ads and store flyer found on Sales & Deals (discount stores, supermarkets and every major chain store).

title: LinkedIn Sales Navigator
description:
Stay up to date with your accounts and leads with LinkedIn Sales Navigator on your Android device, wherever you are.

LinkedIn Sales Navigator helps you target the right buyers and companies, understand what buyers value, and engage buyers with personalized outreach. 

Whether you are waiting for a meeting, traveling between clients‚Äô offices, or just in line for a coffee, Sales Navigator Mobile gives you access to Sales Navigator‚Äôs key sales features where you need them most: everywhere.

- Get real-time sales updates on your accounts and leads
- Discover new accounts and leads with daily recommendations, wherever you are 
- Prep for sales meetings by reviewing prospect profiles and account pages 
- Save new leads after meetings to start getting sales updates
- Send timely InMail, messages, and connection requests 

The Sales Navigator mobile app requires a Sales Navigator account, which is a paid LinkedIn subscription for sales professionals. The app is currently only available in English.

comments: For $100 a month you would expect an app where messages are unified or at least the paid sales navigator app has Superior messaging capabilities and features. But this is not the case. They need to redo this app entirely. Absolutely a disgusting embarrassment to the the company to even offer this app.

Please fix the search system in the app. While searching and going through profiles it randomly resets all the filters and start showing all the profiles without any applied filters. It is a great app but this error kills it all. Please fix it. Thank you!
Sales Nav is great, it's connection are targeted that you don't have to do so much work, sales nav, get the work done for me.

Hardly ever loads. Just gives a blank screen. Plus Access Premium in normal LinkedIn app does not work. Why are there two separate apps? Whilst the system is good on the desktop, the mobile is pretty poor for ¬£500 per year.
The service is amazing. Would like to see more functionality from the app itself, particularly being able to directly view a person's connections like you can in a web browser.

* Admin can give supervisor access to group leader.
* One group member cannot see another group member information.
* Administration or head of group leader can see all officers information.
* Possible to implement Location wise, Department wise security access.

Reporting
------------------
* Excellent reporting features.
* Admin can generate monthly report by excel or pdf from here.

title: SPOTIO | #1 Field Sales App
description:
SPOTIO is a mobile-first solution for outside sales teams to eliminate guesswork, and focus on the highest impact activity in the field. The platform provides outside sales teams with the visibility they‚Äôve been missing to increase sales performance and improve team productivity.

Integrate SPOTIO with your CRM and provide your outside sales team with a mobile solution that works the way they do. Capture critical sales activity data and send it back into your system of record as it gathers business insights to enable your sales team to work smarter in the field.
 
*** TARGETED SALES PROSPECTING ***
Intelligent pipeline generation: On-demand prospect data to keep your pipeline full
Calendar management: Intuitively set, manage, & update appointments in the field
Filter prospects by attributes that matter most to your business so time is spent with the best prospect
 
*** SALES ACTIVITY TRACKING ***
Capture critical sales activity and get clear visibility on what‚Äôs happening in the field
Close business on the spot with in-app e-contracts
Field data entry: See a full history of every account in real-time
 
*** SALES TEAM MANAGEMENT ***
Executive insights: robust field specific analytics and reporting capabilities (best times to prospect, number of meetings it takes to close, etc.)
Sales leaderboard: Measure performance of individual sales reps, teams, or your entire field sales organization
Sales rep accountability with real-time location verification
 
***SALES TERRITORY MAPPING***
Robust territory management designed to fit your business (by zip code, by hand)
Territory permissions so they right roles see the right information
Optimize sales routes for maximum time efficiency
 
 
 
Why field sales reps love SPOTIO:
Easy to Use - Spotio recognized that it‚Äôs data was only valuable if it was used. The platform is designed with a ‚Äú3-tap‚Äù methodology so that most of its key features can be achieved in 3 taps.
 
It Just Works! - SPOTIO increases field sales rep productivity by 46% and reduces turnover by 14%
 
Reps can optimize their routes in the fields to make the best use of their time
 
Fill Your Pipeline - Access targeted leads in your area 
 
Why field sales managers love SPOTIO:
Real Time Visibility - See what your team is doing in real time
The Metrics that Matter - understand where you need to increase training and effort to get better results
Market Penetration - fully saturate your market with smart territory management
Shorten Sales Cycles - easily work with your team to move deals through the pipeline faster
Reduce Turnover - good reps stay when they are enabled with the tools they need to be successful

**NOTE - You do not have to have a CRM as SPOTIO can operate as a standalone solution**

recentChanges:
‚àô Simplified interface making it easier to navigate the application
‚àô Addition of new plus button making it easier to drive actions in the app

‚àô Several bug fixes
comments: It's beyond words how convenient it is to not have to find & record street address, or flip through pages to find specific information. I enjoy the accuracy of the mapping data provided, and I love being able to see notes from all of the people working on a file. I bought a Tablet to use for door-to-door knocking, but it's super convenient to be able to pull out my phone in the office and simply show a coworker what I'm talking about. Spotio is hands-down better than paper on a clipboard!

This is a great CRM for my work. I love it that I know where the most work needs to be done. The app allows me to prioritize the customers along my desired area. The notifications are good at reminding me about future tasks that I had forgotten were on my schedule. Jocelyn Ross

Legacy rocked. We're cancelling our service cuz the new app is so slow, cumbersome, and inefficient. You should have let customers choose. My old company is still on Legacy and adding more users as I write this. It's pretty lame that we can't continue with the older app. Now we have to find a replacement and that sucks. Boo, Spotio. Do better.
Spotio is an exellent field tool. Learn it. Love it. Live it.
Very good with tracking ppl, some things could b worked on but it's on point.

title: Sales Play POS - Point of Sale & Stock  Control
description:
‚ÄúSales Play‚Äù is a perfect POS solution for any kind of business. Your business may be a cafe, bar, restaurant, coffee shop, beauty salon, food truck, car wash, book store or any other business. You may have more than one outlet which you want to manage online, Sales Play POS is the solution.  

Install ‚ÄúSales Play‚Äù to your Tablet or Phone and convert it into a complete Smart POS today.

Sales Play app is with no ads, no contracts, no credit cards, and no commitments.

You can replace your conventional cash register and billing system with Sales Play POS and start tracking sales and inventory in real time. Create items, view sales/ inventory reports, manage multiple stores in the cloud web portal. 

Sales Play supports with many printers. You can simply connect Bluetooth, Cable, Wi-Fi or USB printer. 

Some of the Main Areas 

1. INVOICING / BILLING 
‚Ä¢ Work offline 
‚Ä¢ Both Landscape and Portrait Interfaces 
‚Ä¢ Items Display with Images or without images
‚Ä¢ Number keypad option
‚Ä¢ Bill Split
‚Ä¢ Full control over pricing/Qty/Taxes/Discounts (item vs full value)
‚Ä¢ Easy access to the important interfaces via MORE button
‚Ä¢ Comprehensive Payment Interface
‚Ä¢ Clear information visibility 
‚Ä¢ Multi Payments 
‚Ä¢ Send Receipt via email


2. SALES MANAGEMENT 
‚Ä¢ View past invoices and re-print 
‚Ä¢ Manage Drawer Transactions & Reasons
‚Ä¢ Issue & cancel credit note
‚Ä¢ Credit settlement option
‚Ä¢ Manage other Charges ( Ex. Service/Delivery etc) 
‚Ä¢ Order types ( Ex. Dining/Take away)
‚Ä¢ Manage employee details ( can be attached to bill when needed)
‚Ä¢ Currency in the bill ( manage multiple currencies and issue the bill) 
‚Ä¢ Cash notes (manage the payment interface with needed cash notes)


3. INVENTORY MANAGEMENT 
‚Ä¢ Add/modify/delete Products 
‚Ä¢ Bundling (Bundle few products and create one product. Ex. Promotion) 
‚Ä¢ Manage tax (Create tax codes and attached with products Ex. GST/VAT)
‚Ä¢ Manage product categories 
‚Ä¢ Price change (Individual or bulk)
‚Ä¢ Add Stock- GRN (Individual or bulk)
‚Ä¢ Return stocks 
‚Ä¢ Transfer stocks ( Transfer within locations)
‚Ä¢ Manage suppliers and issue purchase orders 


4. CUSTOMER MANAGEMENT  
‚Ä¢ Create Customers (Fill the profile even with image)   
‚Ä¢ Run Loyalty Program
‚Ä¢ Create agents ( can be attached to invoices when needed)
‚Ä¢ Record customer feedback
‚Ä¢ Record customer orders 
‚Ä¢ Connect social media inside the app

5. REPORTS  
‚Ä¢ Past invoices & Daily Sales 
‚Ä¢ Revenue Reports & Cashier wise reports 
‚Ä¢ Stock Movements 
‚Ä¢ Credit Note reports 
‚Ä¢ Settlement Reports
‚Ä¢ User Access reports 
‚Ä¢ Etc.

WEB BASED BACK OFFICE 
- Complete Reports and Analytics 
- Manage Items 
- Manage Stocks
- Create Loyalty Programs
- Manage Terminals 
- Manage Users   

========================================================================

For more details about hardware please visit 

https://www.salesplaypos.com/purchase/

For the resellers, please contact us for partnerships via

sales@salesplaypos.com

We are always welcome your suggestions and happy to help you.

Topics 
CRM
SFA
Billing

recentChanges:
- product cost make invisible for cashiers
- Fix date validation fails, when language change(Arabic to English)

comments: I want to use the Number Keypad mode to create receipt but there is no button or option to select product item to sell. When I press the number on keypad and press enter it prompt to enter quantity. There is also button B/K that I am not sure the function. Is it related to BOT n KOT, but Business Type is set as Other. There is no related information of the above in Help Center or FAQ page. I tried to chat with your team but the chat app not moving? Please improve the support and user guides

I really like to use this app. Very convenient and helpful. However, I cannot login to the sales back office to update my inventory. It really dissapoint me as I cannot link my ID with other apps of Sales Play Pos- Dashboard. Please fix it.

Hi, I am most impressed by this App however there is 1 problem as it does not support wifi printers for A4 papers instead of thermal printers as thermal printers receipt will fade over time. Kindly upgrade to support other wife printers.

After almost a month of using this app, yes its useful for frontend use. But there are critical features and reports that have bugs like credit. Settlement and cash balance report. Support is responsive but im not sure if they are willing to fix the issues i raise almost everyday since im the one using their product LIVE which most likely they cannot see in actual business scenario.

It is an Good App, I really like the POS system , but there is one problem Adding of tax doesn't make sense and it is very complicated, I have done it multiple times and ask helpline to Sales play but the results of outcome is the same, or else everything In the System is Awesome , that the reason for 4 stars

title: Salesforce
description:
The new Salesforce mobile app is here!

Run your business from your phone -- faster, easier, and with AI as your sidekick. The Salesforce mobile app unlocks a whole new level of productivity, personalization, and speed.

Build mobile experiences faster
With Lightning now available on mobile, building custom mobile apps is faster and easier‚Äîwith clicks, not code. Mobile-optimized lightning components? Check. Dynamic and rich mobile record pages? Check. Now anyone can build amazing mobile apps fast.
 
Access your entire business
The full power of Salesforce is now available from your device. The Salesforce mobile app now includes all your favorite Lightning Apps. And the new navigation bar makes it easier than ever to get to the apps you use most.

Whether you're in the office, on an airplane, or checking in from a coffee shop, the new Salesforce mobile app is your key to productivity.

summary: Salesforce, wherever you are. Manage your day, update records, view dashboards.
recentChanges:
We update the Salesforce mobile app regularly to make it faster and more stable for you.

This version includes bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: Seriously un useable, why bother, one size doesn't fit all. The desktop functional use case is predicated on the executive use case for the software as in modeling a pipeline. Not in features and functionality that makes sales forces more efficient. In actuality, sales force makes work for sales teams. This app is useless and only further perpetuates how disconnected top down management is from the day to day of front line operations and sales teams. Back to the lap top.

Salesforce mobile app has no help support and cannot reset my password. If you use reset password option, it sends you an email link. Use the link and it takes you right back to same login screen with no option to create new password. Highly inconvenience. Guess I'll stick to laptop Salesforce.
Earlier while using the app it was very fast and intutive but I now can hardly able to use it as it takes a long time and only pop up with SF logo
Amazing app. I use it everyday for my business and it keeps me organised and informed of everything important.

It's the little things that make this app unusable, like the Date picker. It doesn't use the normal Android calendar view to pick a date it just shows you the year, month, day num, and then let's you scroll through it. I never know what the date is for when I want something to be due, but I do know two Fridays from now etc.

title: Pipedrive ‚Äì Sales CRM
description:
With Pipedrive for Android you‚Äôll always stay on top of your sales pipeline. Access your contacts, create tasks and take meeting notes wherever you are - all changes are instantly synced to Pipedrive web app. It helps you focus on the right contacts and gives you more control over your sales results.

With the mobile app you can:
- Identify if an incoming call is related to a potential sale with Caller ID
- Automatically link outgoing calls with activities related to sale leads
- Access your to-do list and contacts instantly.
- Look up customer and deal details on the go.
- Add meeting and call notes - synced instantly to web app.
- Start new calls and emails with just one tap.
- Log phone calls. 
- Explore your business on a map view. 
- Get the powerful combination of mobile + web.

A Pipedrive account is required to use Pipedrive for Android. You can sign up for a free trial right on the app.

summary: Pipedrive is a powerful CRM that tens of thousands of small teams love to use.
recentChanges: This latest update is a blend of housekeeping and laying the foundations for some future improvements. Like a regular service for a beloved vehicle, sometimes maintenance and updating is an investment in future happiness.
comments: For me it has a few minor issues, especially with call logging and calls not always being logged. Overall I'm still giving it 5 stars due to how great everything else has worked for me. We didnt have a system like this before at my place of employment and now that we've started using it I cant see myself without something like this.

Terrible Experience. Wasted significant time trying to log in via SSO with the correct email and domain per my internal support team. When you enter the domain and click on the Login button, the app does absolutely nothing. No error message. It doesn't even appear to be checking the domain. It just sits there with the same message asking to type in the domain. Killing the app and starting from scratch yield the same results. Come on, guys! Think about the EUX! Show error messages!

Pipedrive has been our dream solution to crm management. After years of overcomplicated and clunky crm softwares, Pipedrive simplifies and streamlines everything in a way that has what we need and doesn't bother with trivial features that we don't need. Pipedrive simply will not allow a lead to fade into "no man's land". After any communication with a customer, it instantly forces me to create another activity so that Everyone has a next steps plan in place at all times. Love it! Profits doubled

This app is terrible!!! The info appears differently for the info on the website, even after syncing, which takes an extremely long time, btw. Pictures uploaded in the app appear sideways or upside down on the website, in order to view the pictures uploaded through the app, without twisting your neck you, they have to be downloaded, which completely defeats the purpose of uploading the picture! I tried reaching out to customer support on the website but they were no help. FIX THE APP!!!!!!!!!!

Can't login to the Android app using Google authentication. Keeps telling me that my organization requires SSO, and disallows username / password, which I already know. Reached out to support via the desktop web app, and they gave me a run-around for 30 minutes, and finally said they'd reach out to engineers. The web app is great, but I can't even use the Android app.

title: Salestrail: Sales Automation for Salesforce
description:
Improve your sales productivity and generate high-quality data with Salestrail - mobile app that automatically logs calls, emails and events to Salesforce CRM.

Salestrail features include: business card scanner, Caller ID, custom fields and workflows, speech-to-text notes, automated and customized Salesforce workflows, smart reminders, two-way sync, and more.

As a mobile app designed for on-the-go sales reps and field sales & services teams, Salestrail is intuitive and simple to use. Salestrail is a must-have selling tool for every salesperson, sales manager and sales director in various industries (real estate, machinery, financial, consulting, etc). No more boring admin, only more sales!

üî∏Sales Activity Tracking
- Know where your reps are putting efforts into - meetings, emails and calls, and scale the best sales hacks.
- Regardless of whether your area is inside or outside sales, this selling tool will make you and your companies reach the new level of efficiency.


üî∏Outside Sales Mobile App
- Salestrail allows sales reps to access their contacts and leads anywhere, know who's calling with Caller ID, search and call prospects on their mobile. 
- Easy lead management that will help outside sales become more productive everyday.


üî∏Microsoft Office 365 and Gmail Synchronization
Besides automatic logging for Salesforce CRM, you can see: 
- Email history with your prospects and get reminders for upcoming meetings and tasks with Salestrail. 
- Every update made to your calendar will be automatically synced with Salesforce CRM.


üî∏Business Card Scanner
- Regardless of your role as a marketing manager, salesperson or sales manager, our built-in business card scanner makes lead capture very easy. 
- Add custom fields and voice notes to close deals faster. 


üî∏Sales Personal Assistant
- Our customizable workflows and seamless integration make Salestrail a must-have sales tool to plan, organize and track your sales activities everyday. 

Salestrail sales app is a simple and easy-to-use tool for Salesforce that helps salespeople, sales managers and sales directors to track, manage and acquire more customers by smart features: business card scanner, Caller ID, custom fields and workflows, speech-to-text notes, automated and customized Salesforce workflows, smart reminders, two-way sync, and more.

recentChanges:
Hey, this is another update for you!

Upload your business card photos to Salesforce if you want to.
Upload any of your attachments when you create a new object to Salesforce. For example a photo from your notes.

Import contacts from your phone book directly to Salesforce.

comments: I have been using the app for about a month bow and I'm very happy with it! It could be great If I could create and update my SF opportunities as well. Anyway, I got it mainly for logging in calls and caller ID to Salesforce and it functions much better than other apps I've tried before. The main benefit it that all calls are being logged in to Salesforce without me opening the app.
The app is great for creating leads and contacts on the go and tracking all client related conversations to Salesforce. I love the speech-to-text feature for adding meeting notes.
Very optimized app with tons of great features. Quick to set up and easy to connect with Saleforce and start using immediatelly.
Just started it using a week ago and feel very satisfied with app experience. Automatic activity tracking works perfectly

title: Shopify: Ecommerce Business
description:
Run your business wherever you are. Whether you have one or multiple Shopify stores, this app makes it easy for you to manage your orders and products, connect with staff, and track sales.

PROCESS ORDERS
‚Ä¢ Fulfill, refund, or archive orders for each of your store locations
‚Ä¢ Print packing slips and shipping labels
‚Ä¢ Manage tags and notes
‚Ä¢ Add Timeline comments
‚Ä¢ Track conversion right from your order details
‚Ä¢ Create new draft orders and send them to your customers
‚Ä¢ View fraud analysis

MANAGE PRODUCTS AND COLLECTIONS
‚Ä¢ Add products manually or through barcode scan
‚Ä¢ Edit item characteristics or variants
‚Ä¢ Create and update automated or manual collections
‚Ä¢ Manage tags and categories
‚Ä¢ Define product visibility on sales channels
‚Ä¢ Sync with 3rd party sites to sell on Etsy, Amazon, Ebay, and more

RUN MARKETING CAMPAIGNS
‚Ä¢ Grow sales with a Google Smart Shopping campaign
‚Ä¢ Create Facebook ads on the go
‚Ä¢ Track results and get custom recommendations to improve your results over time
‚Ä¢ Write new content for your blog

FOLLOW UP WITH CUSTOMERS
‚Ä¢ Add and edit customer details
‚Ä¢ Contact customers

CREATE DISCOUNTS
‚Ä¢ Create special discounts for holidays and sales
‚Ä¢ Monitor discount code usage

REVIEW STORE PERFORMANCE
‚Ä¢ View sales reports by day, week, or month
‚Ä¢ Compare sales across your online store and other sales channels with a live dashboard

SELL ON MORE SALES CHANNELS
‚Ä¢ Sell online, in-store and more
‚Ä¢ Reach your customers on Instagram, Facebook and Messenger
‚Ä¢ Sync inventory and orders across each channel

EXTEND YOUR STORE'S FEATURES WITH APPS AND THEMES
‚Ä¢ Access your Shopify apps from orders, products, and customers, or right from the Store tab
‚Ä¢ Browse our catalog of free themes and change your online store appearance

Shopify handles everything from marketing to payments, including mobile payments, a secure shopping cart, and shipping. Whether you want to sell clothes, jewelry, or furniture, Shopify has everything you need to run your ecommerce store.
descriptionHTML:
Run your business wherever you are. Whether you have one or multiple Shopify stores, this app makes it easy for you to manage your orders and products, connect with staff, and track sales.

PROCESS ORDERS
‚Ä¢ Fulfill, refund, or archive orders for each of your store locations
‚Ä¢ Print packing slips and shipping labels
‚Ä¢ Manage tags and notes
‚Ä¢ Add Timeline comments
‚Ä¢ Track conversion right from your order details
‚Ä¢ Create new draft orders and send them to your customers
‚Ä¢ View fraud analysis

MANAGE PRODUCTS AND COLLECTIONS
‚Ä¢ Add products manually or through barcode scan
‚Ä¢ Edit item characteristics or variants
‚Ä¢ Create and update automated or manual collections
‚Ä¢ Manage tags and categories
‚Ä¢ Define product visibility on sales channels
‚Ä¢ Sync with 3rd party sites to sell on Etsy, Amazon, Ebay, and more

RUN MARKETING CAMPAIGNS
‚Ä¢ Grow sales with a Google Smart Shopping campaign
‚Ä¢ Create Facebook ads on the go
‚Ä¢ Track results and get custom recommendations to improve your results over time
‚Ä¢ Write new content for your blog

FOLLOW UP WITH CUSTOMERS
‚Ä¢ Add and edit customer details
‚Ä¢ Contact customers

CREATE DISCOUNTS
‚Ä¢ Create special discounts for holidays and sales
‚Ä¢ Monitor discount code usage

REVIEW STORE PERFORMANCE
‚Ä¢ View sales reports by day, week, or month
‚Ä¢ Compare sales across your online store and other sales channels with a live dashboard

SELL ON MORE SALES CHANNELS
‚Ä¢ Sell online, in-store and more
‚Ä¢ Reach your customers on Instagram, Facebook and Messenger
‚Ä¢ Sync inventory and orders across each channel

EXTEND YOUR STORE'S FEATURES WITH APPS AND THEMES
‚Ä¢ Access your Shopify apps from orders, products, and customers, or right from the Store tab
‚Ä¢ Browse our catalog of free themes and change your online store appearance

Shopify handles everything from marketing to payments, including mobile payments, a secure shopping cart, and shipping. Whether you want to sell clothes, jewelry, or furniture, Shopify has everything you need to run your ecommerce store.

recentChanges:
Thanks for using Shopify!

We update our app regularly. This update includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

Having problems? We'd love to know more about what could have made your experience better.

comments: Great website. I have been using shopify for the past 3 years. It easy to understand plenty of help and videos to get the site you want. I just updated my website and it was fairly easy. I have over 800 products online. Thankyou shopify.

For some reason I'm not getting any notifications from the app. I turn on everything, even download sound pack, but still no luck. Phone: Samsung Galaxy S10+ Any suggestions?(already tried reinstalling etc.)
Exciting and helpful. I still don't know all it can do for me or what I can use it for as I am new to most if it. However, Shopify surprises me at every turn.
Very good for small adjustments and a quick look for keeping track on the situation when you're away from the desktop.

Amazing we use the platform for our Website and POS for our Asian Grocery store. That way we can have one inventory system. Only issue I would have is the POS on android dosnt work with the card reader. Our website is - Hekede.co.uk

title: Zoho CRM - Sales & Marketing
description:
The Zoho CRM app helps¬†you manage your clients and business¬†while you are on the move.¬†Turn your phone into¬†a personal sales assistant to simplify your¬†daily activities and¬†focus on what matters the most. Manage your schedule, track your sales visits,¬†collaborate with your team to grow your sales, and nurture client relationships with timely customer support.¬† Become a pro lead manager by following up on leads or¬†the sales manager that everyone envies with¬†top-notch contact management.¬†Locate more leads,¬†easily¬†schedule meetings, and¬†close even more deals using the mobile CRM app.¬†

Start your day with a clear overview of your scheduled tasks, activities, and calls. Plan your day better with these insights, and¬†set reminders for your activities¬†so you'll never miss out. Log calls to¬†capture the¬†finer details of your conversations, and mark activities as complete once you're done.¬†

Be at the top of your game by reviewing notes and attachments before you head out for your important meetings.¬†Check-in to record your customer visits and update the deal details¬†after every single meeting. Save time by attaching voice notes, and close deals with ease.¬†
¬†
Stay up-to-date with real time reporting and dashboards. Gain sales insights on key metrics to make informed decisions from anywhere.¬†You can even access and modify information when you're offline. Don't worry - it gets automatically synced when you're back online.

Connect with your colleagues instantly no matter where you are.¬†Notify and engage other¬†team members¬†with the '@' mention. Attach photos and files directly to your feeds for easier access and improved business efficiency.¬†

With Zoho CRM's Mobile App,¬†you can connect with your customers¬†on the move and manage your end-to-end sales cycle.

¬†Features:
- Visualize sales and marketing trends to make decisions while you're away from your desk.
- Schedule tasks and calls right from your app, and set reminders to stay on track.¬†
- Plan more efficiently using geo-location to recognize a sales rep's position and provide a map of clients and sales opportunities in¬†that vicinity.¬†
-¬†Record customer visits, and¬†add voice notes and files to Deals with ease.¬†¬†
- Log calls and create follow-up activities.¬†
-¬†Collaborate in real time with your team with Feeds.
-¬†Sync your data automatically across all platforms¬†without worrying about network connectivity.¬†

If you have any questions, please write to crm@zohomobile.com .

comments: Our company uses Zoho and for the past 3 years that I've been with them, this App has never worked. You always have to make it work. I've spoken to support multiple times and they've never solved any issue. I was told everytime that it must be my (very new and high spec) device (while other colleagues with other devices and platforms have the same issues, always).

Do not buy! This app will not always function properly. It will stop logging calls and occasionally forget your information and require a refresh. Tech support will delay and promise call backs that never occur.
Excellent App for every business owner and Sales Team to carry out all sales related activities on the go. You can save lots of time while travelling doing all follow up activities
I love Zoho CRM; everything made by zoho is just miles ahead from the other alternatives. Thank you Zoho. I have all the Zoho suite app.
Best app for manage client feedback and keee their requirements easily. Quotation also can be shared easily with automation process.

Plan your day's work, schedule sales meetings, follow-up with leads, prospects & clients, track sales, assign tasks, communicate with field sales team, track field employee's location, Manage employee attendance, generate sales reports, Analyze & increase the productivity of the sales teams.

With custom forms & fields, Route optimization, End-to-End communication, and API integration capabilities, flocksales delivers the best performance even when the network connectivity is offline.

title: QuickSell: WhatsApp Digital Cataloguing and Sales
description:
QuickSell's  Catalogue (catalog) Maker helps you make beautiful product catalogues (catalogs) on your phone on the go and share it with your buyers within minutes. QuickSell supports sharing on all digital media such as Whatsapp, WhatsApp Business, Facebook, Instagram, SMS, Email and 100s of other similar platforms 

üìú Catalogue Maker  
Just choose the products you want to share from your phone gallery, camera or existing products, give a nice title and your new catalogue is instantly ready. Go ahead and impress your buyers.

üìß Share on WhatsApp, WhatsApp Business, Instagram, SMS, Email, Facebook and 100s of other digital platforms 
Rapidly share your catalogues as a link on WhatsApp, Facebook or SMS. Boost your sales dramatically!

 üì¶ Inventory Management 
Keep your product inventory up to date and ready to be shared, from anywhere and anytime. Be the first one to reach out to the buyers!

 üìû Find out interested buyers and when to follow up 
QuickSell's powerful customer analytics suite provides you with in-depth access into how customers are interacting with your catalogues. Now you can always be on the top of your business! 

 üìà Find out popular products and forecast demand
Find out what products are a hit with buyers and stock up for a bumper sale!

 üíª Upload your products on QuickSell's Desktop version 
QuickSell's Desktop version allows your team to bulk upload products via Excel and manage order management and dispatch efficiently

 üîí Privacy Module
Never worry about your product information being misused by anyone. Using QuickSell's Privacy Module you can ensure that your catalogues never fall in the wrong hands. Block competitors and customers from seeing your catalogues and keep your products private to only certain customers.

‚ÑπÔ∏èSales team management
Empower your entire sales team with latest inventory and product information and save time and errors by keeping everyone on the same page.

 ü§ùMultiple sharing modes
 Share your products as a link, images, PDF or Brochure


Why we need permissions we ask for:
 :‚óºÔ∏è: Camera: to take photographs of your products and include them in catalogues
 :‚óºÔ∏è: Storage: to pick up images of your products from your phone gallery or file manager
 :‚óºÔ∏è: Contacts: to easily share your catalogues with your contacts
 :‚óºÔ∏è: Phone: to quickly start a call with an interested buyer from the app
