comments: Great app. Quick and easy way to create and share catalogues for your business. Fast way of sharing your products and services especially for small to medium scale enterprises and online shops. Good at tracking customer trends..

very good app. makes work very easy for me. At first it was working just fine. But now after I put about 30 products it tells me I have reached my maximum. Saying I hv put 150 products yet I only put 30. Please help me, I can't find a way to contact you that's why I wrote here. Otherwise good app
Its a very exciting app,everything is just easier and professional.love it
I wish that the premium fee was a bit economical. Would have definitely bought it. Best app

The app is simple to use, friendly and I honestly love it. however i feel the lite plan is too limited change of theme, simple reports not available for this plan. Also for those selling shoes, may be drop down list for sizes and colors will be awesome.

title: Business Sales Training
description:
‚ñ∫The challenge of business services sales is unique: you‚Äôre selling something intangible. Buyers cannot see or touch it, sales requires prospect education, relationships are crucial, and buyers have to be convinced of the value of working with you and your company.‚ú¶
 
‚ñ∫Did you know? It is 5 times harder to make new customers, than to retain them, so it is essential to keep your regular ones happy. The secret to outstanding achievement is not talent but a focused persistence. Sell with confidence, learn the secrets to sales. Start with 'why?' , why does this person want to buy my product? This App gives delegates an insight into key questioning techniques and buying signals and identifies opportunities to upsell.‚ú¶
 
‚ñ∫Sales training is an integral and fundamental part of the business operational cycle. Improperly trained salespersons often end up providing false assurances, and erroneous commitments that the management later finds too expensive to repair.‚ú¶

‚ñ∫There‚Äôs a saying, ‚ÄúA good sales-person is the one, who sells a comb on a profit to a bald man, making the man feel good about it.‚Äù In the present scenario of unemployment in countries like India, there is an emerging scope for a good salesman with many top-notch employers.‚ú¶

‚ñ∫In a Corporate organization, be it small or huge, there is a key position called the Sales Manager that the bosses love the most, and they implore their HR department to leave no stone unturned in hiring the most suitable person for that position.‚ú¶

title: Pepperi Sales Rep App
description:
Pepperi is an enterprise-grade sales rep app, a mobile CRM tool for sales reps and their managers designed to present catalogs, take orders, prepare sales reports, manage and track sales ordering, perform in-store merchandising, route accounting, DSD, trade promotions and much more. 

Pepperi equips field agents with the CRM tools they need to make their numbers and present a professional image. 

Pepperi‚Äôs sales rep app offers out of the box integration with popular accounting, ERP, and CRM systems including SAP ERP, SAP Business One, Netsuite, Salesforce, Oracle Sales Cloud, QuickBooks, Xero, MYOB, Sage and more, and fully integrates with leading payment systems.

With over a thousand customers in 64 countries, 13 languages and dozens of industries, Pepperi is the #1 e-catalog, order taking and CRM sales rep app serving all sizes of business.

Pepperi main modules:

e-Catalog that sells for you
‚óè	e-Catalog includes unlimited dynamic categories for all your products
‚óè	Merchandising is easy with high resolution photos, multiple view options and customizable fields

Order taking is fast & easy
‚óè	Mobile ordering is faster than you can imagine with Pepperi 
‚óè	Order tracker lets you track past orders and set up future order dates
‚óè	Order management options include flexible discount policies
‚óè	Ordering and selling are easier than ever with our flexible tools

Increase order size with trade promotions including upselling & cross-selling 
‚óè	Buy X, Get Y Free
‚óè	Buy X, Get Y at Z% discount
‚óè	Buy from list X and get from list Y
‚óè	Tiered discounts

Win at the shelf with in-store merchandising
‚óè	Plan the which in-store activities are to be performed by your field agents, schedule store visits, and map the routes to take
‚óè	Capture in-store activities using mobile forms that are completely customizable
‚óè	Perform stock-taking, picture taking, planogram audits and customer satisfaction surveys

Sell-through visibility with inventory tracking 
‚óè	Pair Pepperi with a UPC barcode scanner to leverage Pepperi as an in-store inventory scanner
‚óè	Gain sell-through visibility to minimize dead inventory at the stores, and to optimize manufacturing
‚óè	Track sales and purchases with Pepperi‚Äôs barcode scanner

Pepperi CRM tool integrates with Pepperi e-Commerce Storefront
‚óè	Pepperi integrates seamlessly with Pepperi e-Commerce Storefront, a self-service ordering app for retail stores
‚óè	Manage sales quickly and conveniently - distributors and retailers order straight from your website or mobile app
‚óè	Sales reps have immediate visibility into self-service orders placed by their B2B customers

Enterprise-grade mobile salesforce automation (SFA)
‚óè	SFA made easy with mobile apps that are fully and easily configurable, running on Android mobile devices.
‚óè	State-of-the-art security (ISO 27001 and ISAE 3402 certified) ensures that your data is safe and never compromised.
‚óè	Mobile CRM designed to easily integrate with the existing ERP and Accounting systems that run your business:
‚óè	SAP ERP
‚óè	SAP ERP Business One
‚óè	Salesforce
‚óè	NetSuite
‚óè	Oracle
‚óè	Sage
‚óè	Microsoft NAV
‚óè	QuickBooks Online 
‚óè   Quickbooks Desktop
‚óè	Xero
‚óè	Many more

Industry-specific demos
‚óè	Mobile CRM tool includes pre-built demos for dozens of industries
‚óè	Fully functional free trial available for download with no commitment

Business management is easier than ever with Pepperi sales rep app, whether you own a small business or are a large wholesaler. CRM tools for field agents, field sales, mobile ordering, order management, retail merchandising, productivity and activities tracking, sales tracking and more are included.

Get a 360 degree view of your business and customer interactions with Pepperi.. Download today!

Recommended requirements:  5" screen, Android 6.0,  3GB RAM,  1080x1920 resolution for phablets, 1920x1200 for tablets.

For more information, visit:
https://www.pepperi.com/

For support for this sales rep app, visit:
https://support.pepperi.com/

Find the best deals on preowned items today! Even better than buying in secondhand shops or an online thrift store!

Find the best offers online on secondhand items that you actually need, and make the best offers to sell your used items and earn money! 

Looking to buy home goods and vintage furniture? Seeking used video games or secondhand electronics or a used car? Get used items and vintage stuff on letgo! üéâ

comments: The old version is way better than the new version because the old app was simple and easy to follow and you can see everything on the page together. The new version has too much information that you don't need scattered in-between too many pop-ups and if you don't know to keep strolling down you will miss the other items the seller is selling and they loose out. Go back to the last version. This version doesn't make sense.

Great app. The distance setting in the search filter was a little off. Like I tried putting in items up to 30 miles away but it had some stuff in there that was to me like 40-50 miles away. It seemed better when I narrowed it closer to my location though. That's the only issue I've experienced with it. The process to post what you want to sell is NOT overly complicated, it's simple to use, but it's kind odd looking for me though. But that's just my opinion there, everything else seems great.

I've had great success with this app, my only complaint is regarding the ads. I do understand to keep this app 100% you need to show ads but I find them to be repetative, rather intrusive and very large. If you don't know to keep scrolling once you see a large ad then you will miss out on a lot things for sale.

It's a great way to make extra money. It's fun to meet with all the interesting people however there are a few flaws to the game. For instance, it is a turn off when a person promises to purchase and they give a date and time then they never show up! Its It's frustrating, and a waste of time I wish that LETGO could implement some kind of consequence for the people that stand people doing things

This is a platform that works and is built well. However the app still has many bugs. They're mostly annoying, some are a little inconvenient. None of them inhibit use of the platform though. They've got a ways to go, and are founded on solid ground. Personalized recommended searches must be based on nothing, because I get recommendations for electronics but all I search for a bit are clothes. Notifications to my phone duplicate themselves, lag, and are sometimes broken.

title: Penny Assistant for Direct Sales
description:
A personal assistant for direct sales consultants. She's simple and intuitive and provides a repeatable sales process that strengthens your customer relationships and helps create new ones. Penny will organize and automate your customer orders, help reachout and follow up with prospects and show you where to start and who to talk to every day.


Know where to start each morning

It's never been easier to focus your time and increase your sales. Every night Penny curates an achievable list of your important, time sensitive tasks and puts them on your Daily screen. When you're having your morning coffee (or manage to find 5 minutes in your busy daily routine) simply open Penny and power through the tasks you need to accomplish today to not only keep your business on track but help it grow. You'll never be overwhelmed again.

Be more organized and less busy

Penny will let you know the right time and information to connect with your customers, ensuring you're engaged with your customers and they're ordering regularly. Best of all, she'll do this automatically, while you sleep, so your orders and reminders will be there each and every day, allowing you to focus on customer relationships instead of organizing your time.

We call this the Customer Care Cycle, it's designed to include steps in the order process as well as touch points along the way. These steps include:

‚ÄúCheck-in‚Äù -  scheduled a few days after your customer places their order
‚ÄúConnect‚Äù - added a few weeks after they received their products
‚ÄúAutoship Reminder‚Äù - appears 20 days before your customer is due to re-order
‚ÄúReconnect‚Äù - reminds you to connect with customers who haven‚Äôt ordered in 4+ months 

Know when to reachout and follow up

Paper is meant for planes, not a prospect list. Penny makes it super simple to add people to your funnel, manage them and make sure you never miss a beat‚Äîyou'll never forget to reachout or follow up with a prospect again because Penny's keeping track for you. She makes it so you can:

Scroll‚Äîthrough your contacts and add prospects to your list
Find‚Äîa specific contact
Tag‚Äî‚ÄúHot Prospects‚Äù and easily filter them for your month end hustle
Mark‚Äîif you've sent them a sample
Send‚Äîa message as a text message, email, or in Facebook Messenger

If your current prospect list lives in a notebook or on a spreadsheet you're going to be blown away by how much room to grow you have. Organization is a beautiful thing, especially when your assistant (Penny) does it for you.

Everything you want to know, exactly when you need it

Everything we know about any of your contacts is always just a tap away, ensuring it's available exactly when you need it.

If they're a customer you'll see their current/last order details, their activity history, including all your checkins, connects, if you sent them a greeting card, notes you've added and more. If they're a prospect you'll see your complete history of reachouts and follow ups, the notes you add and their interests.

And if there's a detail not in their profile you want to add, easy, just put it under "Additional details".

comments: Such a great help! It does freeze up on me but if I close the app window and go back into it it works again!

This app makes managing my business so much easier! The reminders and convenient tracking of current customers and prospects is a life saver! I definitely recommend using this on a daily basis to grow your business.

Penny has been a real game changer and I'm loving it! The app makes it simple to streamline my reach outs and manage my customer communication. It looks good, is easy to use and intuitive - way nicer than my old notebook and spreadsheet process.

Sooooooo helpful! Honestly, every time I have a thought or suggestion or question, this development team responds! They listen, take action, and tell me if they cannot execute my idea right away, but still put it in a future suggestions place. Honestly. This virtual assistant is making me more productive. Thank you Dave and team!!!

This app is amazing! It has been so helpful in my business. Penny is the perfect assistant! David and his crew are always there for support when you need it! Another ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê just for them and the Customer Service they provide!

title: SalezShark - CRM Software | Sales Automation App

We understand the nature of the business, and every business has different requirements. This CRM software app delivers faster results with services tailored to your business needs. You can customize the features in your sales dashboard as per the requirement of your business.

We provide handhold support to all your sales and marketing activities. The respective account manager is always there to support you in creating a lead, accessing reports, and scheduling email campaigns to crack great deals. We charge 0% fee on all our training sessions and live tutorials, right from your boarding to the access of the sales automation platform to manage your sales account extensively.

With SalezShark CRM software India, you can:

Minimize manual data entry efforts and get the automated captured leads from various sources
Locate your leads, accounts, and contacts on maps to crack better deals
Understand customer‚Äôs preferences to drive your customer engagement strategy and serve them in a better way with this marketing automation app
Get Proactive Recommendations of prospective companies
Get notified of all approaching meetings beforehand, so no opportunity goes missed
Collaborate with your team real-time
Attach files directly from your device
Keep a tab on the conversion probability of a lead with predictive analytics
Get an accurate view of your business with comprehensive sales forecast

title: HelloLeads Sales CRM - Accelerate Sales
description:
Your small business needs a smart and simple CRM.

Use HelloLeads CRM and improve lead management, lead tracking, sales pipeline, follow ups and  grow your business.

HelloLeads helps your sales professionals &  sales force to covert leads and prospects into customers, quickly with ease. HelloLeads is trusted by more than 24,500 small and growing businesses worldwide. 

HelloLeads, an award winning CRM, is loved by small business owners and sales professionals. Here are few FAQs.

*** Why should I use HelloLeads?

HelloLeads empowers sales &  marketing teams to improve lead conversion rates & sales by :

1. Getting all leads in one place
2. Qualifying and Organizing Leads
3. Providing deeper insights on prospects and leads
4. Driving rapid lead response
5. Improved selling discipline
6. Lead nurturing, lead conversion, lead management, sale lead tracking
7. Helps in Sales management, sales tracking, sales conversion
8. Improved productivity, ease of use, security of sales data and team tracking.   

*** Where can I use HelloLeads?

‚Ä¢ Exhibitions, Expos and Trade shows / tradeshows 
‚Ä¢ Facebook ad leads, google ad leads, linkedin leads
‚Ä¢ Website enquiries, website leads 
‚Ä¢ Field Sales
‚Ä¢ Cold calling 
‚Ä¢ Regular Follow-ups

*** Who can use HelloLeads?

‚Ä¢ Sales and Marketing Heads and Managers
‚Ä¢ Sales and Marketing Associates
‚Ä¢ CEO's of Small and Medium Enterprises
‚Ä¢ Purchase executives, CEO's for reverse prospecting
‚Ä¢ Multinational Companies and Large Organizations and its sales departments
‚Ä¢ Small and Medium Businesses / SME / MSME
‚Ä¢ Independent Business Professionals
‚Ä¢ Start ups / Start-up / startups
‚Ä¢ People who use HelloLeads include business owners, small business owners, salespersons, sale managers, sales reps, self-employed, real estate broker, agents and freelancer.

*** Is HelloLeads suitable for my industry or segment?

HelloLeads is actively used by:

‚Ä¢ Finance and Insurance
‚Ä¢ Healthcare and Medical
‚Ä¢ Marketing Agencies & Services
‚Ä¢ Manufacturing
‚Ä¢ Education & Training
‚Ä¢ Events & Tradeshows
‚Ä¢ E-commerce or Retail
‚Ä¢ Consulting or Advisory
‚Ä¢ Real Estate and Construction 
‚Ä¢ Software and IT
‚Ä¢ Trading 
‚Ä¢ Business Services

*** What are the key features of HelloLeads?

‚Ä¢ Organize leads, Off-line/offline and online lead capture, offline records
‚Ä¢ Business Card scanning/business card scanner
‚Ä¢ Scanning QR codes
‚Ä¢ Estimates & Invoices
‚Ä¢ Qualify your leads

‚Ä¢ Sales team management, sales performance tracking, weekly reports, analytics


*** Is HelloLeads a Small Business CRM?

HelloLeads is a simple and easy to use CRM. HelloLeads is an effective alternative to popular CRMs which are costly to acquire and complex to use. You can compare the price and features of HelloLeads with Salesforce, HubSpot, Zoho CRM, Leader App, FreshSales, Insightly, Base CRM, Pipedrive and you will find HelloLeads a compelling choice. 

Try out 14 days free trial version to check what all you can do with HelloLeads. 

For more information visit https://www.helloleads.io or email us at support@helloleads.io

comments: This app and the support for the app are not quality at all. It's taken up to an hour for pins to load on my very new very up-to-date phone because it has a surprisingly small amount of pins that it's able to load at once. Not good for team knocking, not good for sharing leads.

there's no doubt that these folks want to help but I've had so many problems I wish I had never gotten involved with it. The biggest problems are around the user interface updating and viewing contacts in Android

BUG: I cannot add users to any of the zones that I create. when I click on a name to add it does not respond and nothing is changed. Thank you for the update! Finally this app is usable on an android smartphone. Still room for performance improvement, but the ludicrous issues crippling the app seem to have been resolved. Recently realized there is a 'current location' button hidden in the map icon menu, thats an important function I didnt see before.

Super buggy. Slow for what we do. I work in Solar and we need to see all our coworkers pins. They take forever to load on Samsung. Seems like it's friendlier to Apple Users. Was asked to do a 5 star review for a free shirt. Kinda hinky. I think it's better to earn reviews for having a great app. Hope they improve this and stop telling me I need to keep upgrading my phone to have it function smoother. When the newest Samsung devices have the same issues.
I love this app, it makes canvassing easy to track and also exporting addresses to create mailings. Super easy to use and a very useful tool for anyone doing door to door.

title: SAP Business One Sales
description:
The SAP Business One Sales mobile app for Android lets you effectively handle your sales activities anywhere, anytime. The mobile app connects to the SAP Business One application, giving sales people access to the most relevant business information and processes, for efficient and successful management of customers and sales.

Key features of SAP Business One Sales for Android

‚Ä¢ Get coverage of the entire sales pipeline and handling of all sales-related documents, including sales opportunities, quotations, and orders
‚Ä¢ Manage customers and leads using analytical information and intelligent outlooks
‚Ä¢ Arrange daily activities and record all check-ins
‚Ä¢ Monitor sales performance using predefined KPIs
‚Ä¢ Check inventory levels and get product details

Note: Use of SAP Business One Sales with your business data requires SAP Business One 9.2, version for SAP HANA as your back-end system. You can try out the app first using a demo login.

title: Loyverse POS - Point of Sale & Stock Control
description:
Loyverse POS is the free POS (point-of-sale) software perfect for your retail store, cafe, bar, restaurant, pizzeria, bakery, coffee shop, food truck, grocery store, beauty salon, car wash and more. 

Use Loyverse POS point of sale system instead of a cash register, and track sales and inventory in real time, manage employees and stores, engage customers and increase your revenue.

Mobile POS System
- Sell from a smartphone or tablet
- Issue printed or electronic receipts
- Accept multiple payment methods
- Apply discounts and issue refunds
- Track cash movements
- Scan barcodes with the built-in camera
- Keep recording sales even while offline
- Connect a receipt printer, barcode scanner, and cash drawer
- Connect Loyverse Customer Display app to show order information to your customers
- Manage multiple stores and POS devices from a single account

Inventory Management
- Track inventory in real time
- Set stock levels and receive automatic low stock alerts
- Bulk import and export inventory from/to a CSV file
- Manage items that have different sizes, colors, and other options

Sales Analytics
- View revenue, average sale, and profit
- Track sales trends and react promptly to changes
- Determine best-selling items and categories
- Track financial shifts and identify discrepancies
- View complete sales history
- Browse reports on payment types, modifiers, discounts and taxes
- Export sales data to the spreadsheets

CRM and Customer Loyalty Program
- Build a customer base
- Run loyalty program to reward customers for their recurring purchases

Restaurant and Bar Features
- Connect kitchen printers or Loyverse Kitchen Display app
- Use dining options to mark orders as dine in, takeout or for delivery
- Use predefined open tickets in a table service environment

Credit Card Payments
- Use your preferred merchant service provider for non-integrated payments
- Select one of our integrated payment providers available in 30+ countries. Integrated payments save time, ensure better accuracy and minimize errors.

comments: App has potential but lack of customer support is impossible to work with. I have 7 mobile sales reps. Currently using invoiceASAP. I wanted to switch to InSitu Sales app because of several features that invoiceASAP doesn't offer. The good.. 1. Credit invoices will sync into Quickbooks 2. Sales reports on mobile device are great for commission paid sales reps. 3. Routing feature is good for keeping reps organized 4. Price levels for different customers The bad.. 1. Survey's do not work 2. Credit features is not user friendly 3. Payment applied in QuickBooks will not sync back to the app 4. You can not remove estimates or orders from dashboard. I think InSitu has a good product but poor execution. I purchased 2 keys for me and a rep to test before switching the other reps over. I was told I would receive a tech support call to set up my company and walk me through the different features. They cancelled on me the morning of. I emailed several times requesting another date and time. They never responded to my request. I attempted to set up the app myself over the course of a month. Then the syncing issues started. InSitu claims the iPhone 6 was the problem. Same iPhone that runs every other app with no issues. This was the end of road for me. If they could every get their $#!+ together it'd be a 5 star app.
Some of the accounts don't work with this app, cant take orders. Reported that problem before, but so far nobody helped to fix it
Cannot disable location services. Too invasive. Need better controls. Going to uninstall.
very useful and good software for very cheap price
Good app for making invoices on the field

title: 5miles: Buy and Sell Used Stuff Locally
description:
5miles opened a new channel called 5miles Dash. It is a new auction feature that allows you to bid on brand new items.
- Auctions last 90 seconds and bids start at $1.
- Only pay when you win.
- Items are shipped directly to your door.
- If user is unsatisfied with a product, we offer buyer protection so you can request a refund.
- Claim up $5 in credits towards your first purchase.

5miles is the top-rated buy and sell app: local shopping made easy, safe, and fun. Discover great classifieds in your area or far away. Buy & sell your stuff, find a place to live, hire local services, or get a new job all from the comfort of your smartphone. FREE to list. FREE to discover. Buy and sell within 5 miles.

FREE to list. FREE to discover. FREE to boost. All within 5 miles.

Easy
‚Ä¢ Snap a photo and offer up your items in seconds
‚Ä¢ Use GPS and zip code to find thousands of listings nearby
‚Ä¢ Make an offer by sending an in app chat message
‚Ä¢ Free to boost your post to send it to the top of the feed
‚Ä¢ Easy registration via Facebook or email
‚Ä¢ Share your listings via Facebook, Twitter, SMS, and Email

Safe
‚Ä¢ Email, phone, and Facebook verifications
‚Ä¢ Rate and read reviews of buyers and sellers
‚Ä¢ Use our Safe Area Exchange Locator (SEAL) feature to find a secure meetup spot 
‚Ä¢ 5miles team constantly monitors listings and chats to keep fraud away
‚Ä¢ 5miles doesn't share your information with anyone
‚Ä¢ Don't want to meetup? Choose shipping for your exchange method

Fun
‚Ä¢ Discover great stuff near and far by browsing photos
‚Ä¢ Search and filter to find relevant listing
‚Ä¢ Like items and follow sellers
‚Ä¢ Make offers and get the best deals
‚Ä¢ Chat to share more details, photos, and meeting spots
‚Ä¢ Share listings to Facebook and Twitter to sell faster

What makes 5miles different from other buy and sell apps?
1. Phone number verification to reduce spam and fraud
2. Access to SEAL (Safe Exchange Area Locators)
3. Boost, a feature to move your listings to the top of the feed, free of charge
4. User reviews
6. Includes Services, Jobs, and Housing categories
6. Tools to help sellers sell faster
7. Shipping and online payment features
8. Find or post Deals & Events in your area. Everything from restaurant deals to estate sales.

5miles is like having your own online garage sale without the hassle. You can search for products like furniture, household goods, electronics, cell phones, cars, auto parts, jewelry, purses, clothing, shoes, and more....

Find a cleaning service, handyman, plumber, babysitter, mover, creative professionals and more. Make sure to check their reviews first to find one you can trust.

Looking for housing? Find apartments, houses, and condos for rent or sale. Landlords, list your real estate in a snap!

Looking for work? Find jobs near you! Full-time, part-time, freelance jobs, or short gigs. 

Looking for your next happy hour, hair cut, massage, car repair deal, and more? Check out our Deals & Events. Find or post everything from garage sales to service deals to automotive deals and many more.

How to use 5miles:

Buying

1) Browse listings
2) Make an offer or chat with the seller
3) Have the item shipped or meet up with the seller

Selling

1) Snap a photo, set the price and add a description
2) Communicate with buyers through the in app chat feature
3) Ship or meet up with a buyer

FREE for everyone. No service or transaction fees to buy or sell.

Download now and discover great things from the 5miles community. Enjoy the experience of selling and buying locally. Are you ready to go shopping?

Want to find out more about us? 
https://www.5miles.com/

More ways to connect with 5miles:
http://facebook.com/5milesapp
http://twitter.com/5milesapp
http://instagram.com/5milesapp
Email: hello@5milesapp.com

comments: Taking advantage of Coronavirus to make money by featuring upcharged health products. The virus toll counter is also updated slowly, as there have been way more confirmed cases than it says. I used to like this app, but I never thought it would get this scummy.

Ive always enjoyed this app but i dont think they push the sale of local items that much i think they are more concered with the auctions and the Dash section. Ive bought 2 items with both arriving broken and yes they refunded my money but wouldnt send another one to replace it nor any compensation for the trouble it caused me both times. It makes me think i shouldnt buy from dash anymore you cant contact the seller individually. I do like the point system though so 5 stars it is for now

App has changed so much, it's just not the same. Pitiful views, no boost option except with coin rewards which are just a waste of time to complete, and why is this app using over 1G of my storage space? That's un heard of. The Dash feature needs to be monitored unless this is no longer a family friendly app, I mean items range from crotchless lingerie to bondage looking items and barely nude models showcasing these? Seriously guys, not family friendly at all

find anything you need on this app at awesome prices!!! EDITED: I live in the United States but for some reason when I try to share the link to friends or share the app for them to download, it says "sorry this is not available in your country" ??? So exactly what countries actually get the rewards for sharing the app with their friends? I will change my review back to 5 stars when I get a good reason for this. Other than is issue, I have loved the app so please let me know why.

Better than other apps, but still needs work. I miss the shipping feature since it helped me get some cool stuff not usually found local. That should still be up to the seller though. The coins feel gimmicky, and kinda more annoying than fun. Still need to not be able to rate literally anyone you have a conversation with ( black mirror anyone?) And as for "removing inappropriate ratings", still have it on there after 4 yrs, but removed their's.

title: Online Sales Pro
description:
Online Sales Pro (OSP) is a sales tool that lets you close more deals in less time. With an OSP account and the OSP app, you can generate high quality prospects for your business. Built-in features include one-click messaging, CRM (customer relations management), the managing of leads 24/7, and the increase of sales conversions--from anywhere. 

With the OSP app your leads come to you in real-time and you get a push notification. Within seconds, you can see the lead‚Äôs information and with one touch you are calling, texting, or email them. 

Using Online Sales Pro on your phone allows you to access everything you need for real-time lead delivery for your business online--simply. Customize landing pages, track leads, view stats, and use built-in features. Quickly reply back to leads, take and store notes, and check real-time notifications. 

In addition to providing a CRM for your leads, Online Sales Pro also provides: 
-Pages: Customize unlimited landing pages and use all the features of OSP
-Sales: Leads are instantly delivered and stored for quick follow up to the mobile app. 
-CRM: Keep organized with every lead is in one place.
-Community: Dedicated support team to help, and thriving online community to join.
-Integrations: Integrate your email autoresponder and send messages on autopilot. 

Why People love OSP:
Online Sales Pro is a game changer. A powerful sales tool providing instant lead delivery, training, an online community, and a platform to be productive anytime, anywhere.

title: eOrder Sales App
description:
eOrder Sales App is a perfect Sales App for Consumer Packed Goods companies. Also, for any field sales teams, who are working on tasks, such as:

 ‚Ä¢  Collecting orders. 

 ‚Ä¢  Field Sales

 ‚Ä¢  Merchandise (Taking pictures, filling out forms, electronic signature etc). 

eOrder Sales App enables companies to improve their field sales efficiency. Moreover, improve daily tasks completion of collecting orders & merchandising.  Our sales software, let‚Äôs field sales reps collect orders fast and without human made mistakes. While field sales managers can look over and create daily tasks to their field sales teams.

eOrder Sales App is going to help you to increase your sales revenue! Decrease mistakes. eOrder sales app is a cloud based system. It allows the field sales rep to download products and customer data from a web server. Take orders in the field, and upload them back to the back office. Where Sales Manager can overlook submitted daily or weekly orders. You can do all your sales today and send report when you will reach to a wifi or Mobile network. eOrder sales app can work without having network connections. Your field sales reps are going to work like a one strong united sales team.

 KEY FEATURES 

‚Ä¢ Product ordering
‚Ä¢ Daily/Weekly Schedule
‚Ä¢ Automated stock ability
‚Ä¢ Clients credit score
‚Ä¢ Re-pricing ability
‚Ä¢ Mobile Forms
‚Ä¢ Pictures with tags
‚Ä¢ Easy to learn and use
‚Ä¢ Simple user interface
‚Ä¢ Sales Manager platform
‚Ä¢ Bar-code scanning
‚Ä¢ Invoice printing
‚Ä¢ Web admin
‚Ä¢ Multiple price lists
‚Ä¢ Products categories
‚Ä¢ KPI analytic

WHAT DO WE DO?

We are providing SaaS, (Software as a service). We are adding more features every day. So eOrder sales app can become a leader in the sales app market. We do have the best customer support service. Any question asked is going to have an answer within an hour during business week hours.  We do have the ability to make a quick response to our clients‚Äô needs.  Make fast and co efficient changes at any time.

Our sales app is used by the largest wholesale company in the Baltic States - Sanitex

Our sales app is also popular among small and private companies.  Where they only do have 2 or more active field sales reps working. 

Sales Manager can create tasks such as: Mobile forms, Product Categories, send it to his sales reps and wait for  them to fulfill them online. It's important to have right sales tools in the field, because who makes more sales - wins it all. 

We do have a multilingual eOrder sales app catalog. So far there are 3 Languages - (English,  Russian, Lithuanian). If there are a big need, we can customize among our clients request. 

eOrder sales app is now being used in more than 20 Countries in the World. Our goal is to become the best Sales app available in the market.

super super super. in my small business. thanks i used 50 more app. but this app give all option in one. useful, all i wanted in one app. but one thing missing. each induvidual product image cannot be load (there is no option to add product image) in add product. . if product image added very efficiency to manage and use. some problems around product special price in add product, and i also like to pay when something gave us worthy app.

title: Sales Order, Report & Employee Tracking Mobile App
description:
Delta Sales App (http://deltasalesapp.com) is a field sales tracking, order automating, sales reporting field sales force mobile app for automating order taking, payment collections, tracking salesman GPS, beat planning and reporting expenses.

It is one of the best salesman/employee location tracking app & automating android mobile app for different type of business like FMCG, Pharma, Field Services, Garments, Automobiles and other business having multiple salesmen ensuring sales team focus on the targets. Delta Sales App helps to increase business productivity by 60% and boost your sales force efficiency by almost 30% in lead and sales tracking.

Delta Sales App helps to turn every customer interaction into a revenue-generating opportunity. It helps to monitor field sales staff accurately without depending on manual records and also track salesman real-time locations using GPS ensuring their privacy. Sales tracking monitors and manages sales employees with ease and simplicity.

‚úîÔ∏è Key Module of Delta Sales App:

‚úÖ Order Automation: Track orders received by salesman/sales employee
‚úÖ Payment & Collection Automation: Track salesman payments & collections done
‚úÖ Real Time Salesmen Tracking: Track sales employees/salespeople locations
‚úÖ Attendance & Leave Management: Track field sales employee attendance & leave with ease and get notified 
‚úÖ Expense Management: Track, approve and manage the expenses of a salesman during their fields visit.
‚úÖ Activities Management: Update your salesman/sales employee about the task they need to carry out and track their daily activities
‚úÖ Parties Management: Add new parties with easy and manage your parties in your fingertips
‚úÖ Product Management: Track, create and update your product details
‚úÖ Stock Taking: salesman can easily enter the remaining stock of retailer which will help in decision making.
‚úÖ Beat Plan: Sales manager can assign the route to salesman and salesman can also create his own beat plan.
‚úÖ Announcements: Create announcements and update all your salesman at once
‚úÖ Automated Report & Analytics: Streamline reports of each salesman including their working hours, distance traveled, GPS locations, orders and collections

‚úîÔ∏è Why Delta Sales App?

‚úÖ Live salesmen tracking: Know where your sales employees are, with real-time GPS location tracking
‚úÖ Automated order taking: Eliminate tedious work of collecting sales order from different salesmen
‚úÖ Stock level management: Supply insufficient products before time and add value to the clients
‚úÖ Elimination of manual work: Save time and cost, eliminate manual errors and  systematize work process
‚úÖ Determine sales employee performance: Automatically rate and rank the sales team members based on their performance.
‚úÖ Analyze market demands: Understand and analyze the trends, problems and challenges faster
‚úÖ Improve team collaboration: Reduce communication between the team to increase sales productivity by 30%	
‚úÖ Boost sales force efficiency: Delta Sales App provides salesmen a way to perform better in the field
‚úÖ Zero information loss: Always be updated with customer information and enhance sales 
‚úÖ Streamline sales activities: Track the number of calls, visits, meetings and other tasks done by salesman
‚úÖ Increase company revenue: With automated sales process and streamline reporting, scale your business

Mobile sales tracking app is the most to grow businesses. It has been a critical requirement across the globe for efficient field sales employee tracking, sales automation and sales management.

1) A Delta Sales App Account is required before login to the app.

We will be offering 14 days free trial, free active support and no credit card is required so, Sign Up today & start managing cum automating your company sales process now!

If you have any feedback, please feel free to reach us at sales@deltatechnepal.com. We will be happy to hear from you.

title: Sales POP!
description:
We wish you the warmest of welcomes to our Sales POP! online magazine. In this case POP isn‚Äôt just a word‚Äìit‚Äôs an acronym for ‚ÄúPurveyors Of Prosperity.‚Äù

As a modern digital magazine, Sales POP! is multimedia and brings you written content, video, slideshares and infographics, e-publications and even free tools.

Sales POP! content is aimed at empowering sales leaders, sales management, sales professionals and entrepreneurs to achieve new heights of success. As we know, it‚Äôs a whole new sales world today. The Web has radically changed all of our lives, and at the same time has radically changed how professional buyers shop for products and services, how salespeople prospect for new customers, and how existing customers are serviced and maintained.

Sales POP! covers all these areas and much more‚Äìand it‚Äôs quite certain it won‚Äôt be running out of content anytime soon.

But it is even more than that! We are building a community of people with an interest in sales from the practitioner to the thought leader and beyond. We aim to be at the leading edge of the conversation about how sales is evolving and what it means to both business and society at large. We believe that sales/trade has a peacekeeping component and when executed in a fair and equitable way by seller and buyer alike, creates mutual prosperity and a better life for all.

So go ahead, Sell More, Spread Peace!

title: OnePageCRM - Sales CRM
description:
A OnePageCRM account is required to use OnePageCRM for Android. Sign up for a free trial on www.onepagecrm.com

OnePageCRM converts the complexity of sales into a simple to-do list. 
This simple customer relationship management (CRM) uses Getting Things Done [GTD] principles to help you convert leads to customers, reach sales targets and grow your business fast. With OnePage, salespeople can always stay on top of their sales pipeline, manage contacts, track sales, log calls or create tasks all from your android phone or tablet.
Focus on your Next Action to easily convert leads into customers and grow your business.

Integrate One Page CRM with other applications such as MailChimp, Unbounce, Wufoo, Skype, Evernote, Google Apps, Help Scout and Zapier to name a few.




EASY CRM AND SALES MANAGEMENT

- We focus you 100% on taking action. NOT data entry.

- A smart system to ensure you always follow up with contacts.

- Sync your contacts, notes and deals across all devices.

- Import a contact from your address book.

- Import your contacts from Salesforce, PipeDrive, Insightly CRM, Zoho CRM, Base CRM, Dynamics CRM, Prosperworks, Sellsy, Sage CRM and more.

- Capture and update leads, prospects and contacts while you‚Äôre on the road and manage your sales pipeline.

- Start making new calls, send text messages and emails in just one tap.

- Forward customer emails directly to contacts in OnePageCRM.

- Of course you can close more sales, all from your mobile.

And so much more...

* Join over 10,000+ happy users who love working in OnePageCRM *

* Create an account and get organized in less than 2 minutes! *




PRESS & ACCOLADES

The Times, Forbes, 

Techcrunch: "it takes a ‚Äúzero-admin‚Äù approach that isn‚Äôt just designed to help manage contacts and track sales, but to actually help sell."

The Guardian: " a thorough and well organised CRM manager with a superb user interface."

ZDNet: "providing simple, laser-focused cloud applications that do one thing really well -- help small businesses close sales."

Zapier: "Want a really simple CRM? OnePageCRM may be just what the doctor ordered."




THE PASSIONATE PEOPLE BEHIND ONEPAGECRM

‚ÄúWe build software that we love to use ourselves! We design for ease of use irrespective of fluency. We constantly listen to our customers to ensure we match the needs of today‚Äôs business, and produce applications that deliver on those promises but also exceed expectations.‚Äù




WHAT'S NEW IN THE v3 UPDATE

A big update for the mobile app.
Our goal is to allow you to do everything from your phone so you‚Äôll never need to go into the office. So purely to avoid office small talk we have redeployed all our engineering resources and award winning design from around the globe allow you to do as much of the sales process from your mobile device as possible. 

This includes:

- Add a next action and deadline to a contact to ensure you always follow up.
- Set up a queue of follow up actions once complete.
- Assign these actions to another team member.
- You can now view your pipeline in the app.
- Quickly add and edit a deal and related notes.
- Fast / improved user interface. It‚Äôs not quite ‚ÄòMinority Report‚Äô level yet but we dream of the day.
- Search / add / delete / edit / update / ask on a date / any contacts. (We recommend a lovely candle lit dinner).
- See if you are going to hit target by filtering deals and expected close dates. (To pay for said date).
- Record notes on the go, for contacts and deals. (Please don‚Äôt note and drive).
- See, or get directions to, a contact's address on Google Maps.
- Now you can see and upload photos of your contacts on your mobile.
- Edit and update your deals when you make that sale! Woot, drinks on you!
- Add contacts from your own phone to OnePageCRM. Maybe exclude your Mum‚Ä¶ unless she has budget this quarter‚Ä¶

comments: Exactly what I needed to organize my prospects. The speed dialer and chrome extension for clipping leads are crucial for maximizing my productivity.

When you flick between the app and another app on Android it keeps deleting data. So if I open a contact and add a phone number, then go back to the contacts website to get their email, then go back to One Page CRM and the phone number is gone. I have to save the contact after every field. Makes it a bit painful. Phone call recording would be cool.

good app. 6mos user i cant fully let go of my excell lists though. there is alot of functionality missing. this wasted space in the online version. that said there us so much potential here a great app. id like to see the UI be customizable so we can actually move feilds around. having to actually have to type the slashes in date of birth box is a hassle. the form field should know if i type in 8 digit date of birth where to where to put the slashes in ##/##/####
simply best.. no words.. i got. what i wanted. i searched for crm for two months everyday. finally my search ends here.. simple to use, yet powerful tool.
I'm excited about my job again as I use this great app to own what I've done and start each day with a plan.

title: Nextdoor: Local News, Garage Sales & Home Services
description:
Nextdoor is available nationwide.

Nextdoor is the neighborhood hub. Connect with your neighbors, stay in the know of what's happening, find home services near you, form a neighborhood watch, or just get to know the people in your neighborhood.

Use Nextdoor to stay informed about what‚Äôs going on in your neighborhood. Find a garage sale, dog walker, last-minute babysitter, or handyman. Network with your neighbors to keep up with local news, plan a local event, or share safety tips.

Neighbors can help us in so many ways, we just need an easier way to connect with them.

Whether you want to hire a local babysitter, find yard sale deals, or sell your unwanted household items, Nextdoor makes it easy to talk with neighbors about what matters most to you. 

Download Nextdoor and see for yourself why it‚Äôs the #1 neighborhood app:

Social Networking for Neighbors
‚Ä¢ Get recommendations for the best local handyman
‚Ä¢ Sell items to your neighbors
‚Ä¢ Get offers & free stuff when a neighbor offers up that used appliance she no longer needs
‚Ä¢ Meet your neighbors and finally call that nice man down the street by his first name

Neighborhood Events
‚Ä¢ Find local events like cookouts and community activities
‚Ä¢ Find yard sales and garage sales near you

Home Services & Deals
‚Ä¢ Hire a babysitter or a recommended nanny 
‚Ä¢ Hire a pet sitter or dog walker for your furry friend
‚Ä¢ Hire a handyman pro, house sitter, or catering company with local classifieds

Safety Tips & Crime Watch
‚Ä¢ Organize a neighborhood watch‚Äîquickly get the word out about crime and safety
‚Ä¢ Share neighborhood crime reports
‚Ä¢ Share information during a natural disaster

Network and connect with your neighbors, buy and sell things, and join a community when you download Nextdoor.

OUR MISSION
We created Nextdoor because we believe that the neighborhood is one of the most important and useful communities in a person's life. We hope that neighbors everywhere will use the Nextdoor platform to build stronger and safer neighborhoods around the world.

PRIVACY
Fences are sometimes necessary. But online privacy is always necessary. Nextdoor is 100% private‚Äîa trusted environment where all neighbors are verified, making it safe to share online the kinds of things you'd be okay sharing with your neighbors in person. 

Here's how:
‚Ä¢ Every neighbor has to verify their address
‚Ä¢ All members go by their real names, just like in person

Don‚Äôt miss out on what‚Äôs happening in your neighborhood. Download the app today.

Connect with us:
https://www.facebook.com/nextdoor
https://twitter.com/nextdoor

Terms: nextdoor.com/member_agreement
Privacy: nextdoor.com/privacy_policy
California "Do Not Sell My Information" Notice:  www.nextdoor.com/do_not_sell

summary: Find a yard or garage sale, dog walker, babysitter & more from your neighbors
recentChanges: Time for your weekly update! We're always working hard to make the Nextdoor app even better, so your experience is fun, fast, and bug-free.
comments: Before you download this app be aware that the extent to which they will pass along, and the liberties they will take with your private info borders on incredible. READ THE T&A, PRIVACY POLICY. If that's not enough, the app size listed in the "about" readme is about 18mb. The actual size of the install is almost 100mb. Just so you know. I'm certain there are plenty of alternatives out there and - I'm outta here!

I use this app for sharing/seeking recommendations and commenting on local issues. Also for advertising community events. The ambience of discussion is friendly and helpful. Occasional techy exchange of views, but the only aggressive 'troll' I have read seemed to get cut out fairly quickly. There is some monitoring , both automated (warning if you use a sweary word) and I think real time person monitoring. So it is a useful social media platform. Advertising keeps it going - not too intrusive.

A great idea and easy to use but it's only as good as the people who use it. I hope that it will not become another medium for people to promote their business and selling stuff. There are apps for that and Facebook has plenty. I appeal to people to avoid this and use it for the things that connect us rather than as a monetizing tool!

I find it helpful for getting people to do work around my house using other folks recommendations and I give mine too. The notifications about crime are also great and folks are aware of what's going on in their neighborhood. I appreciate the sheriff's dept alerts, too. Great all around app.

I haven't had this app long, but it does provide helpful local information. It is rather confusing but that should get better with use. Especially now, people are posting good information related to coronavirus resources, help for those needing assistance, and even a central Mid-Hudson Valley group who's mission it is to connect people needing help with those who can offer it.

title: Weekly Sales, Deals & Coupons
description:
Weekly is an incredible app that helps you find great savings from local department stores, specialty and discount stores across the US. Every week it presents you with local sales from 100+ nationwide retailers such as Macy's, Kohl's, Best Buy, Jo-Ann Stores, Dillard's, Wal-Mart, Sears, Walgreens, CVS/pharmacy and many others. So, get rid of your Sunday papers and start using Weekly today!

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ 

Features: 

‚úî Browse weekly sales from your favorite local stores 
‚úî Gorgeous HD quality flyer viewing experience 
‚úî Intuitive image flip-open for showing individual on-sale items and saving to list 
‚úî Pinch zoom in and photo-capture images 
‚úî Build shopping list easily from sale items 
‚úî Sort list items by store and view images and items offline 
‚úî Use map and GPS to locate stores fast
‚úî Share sale items with friends
‚úî Tested for popular tablets

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ

To access sales quickly, Weekly allows you to bookmark your favorite stores into different lists, and you can access them with just a single finger tap. To save you from typing locations when doing store search, Weekly‚Äôs map feature enables you to find stores easily by simply moving the map to search at different regions.

To help save your time and effort, browse the deals and save the ones you are interested in to the shopping list before hitting the stores. Tap on product images on each circular page for ‚Äúfly-out‚Äù items and save them to list easily!

comments: This app has stores listed that closed over a year ago and doesn't list stores that have been open for a couple of years. Worthless to me.
Won't search for any stores. Tells me my phone isn't connected. Bummer...
Never works worthless app

Had an app called Weekly Ads and Sales free and could no longer find them on the market.  This app is very similar and I love it because I can page through the ads myself.  It is like having the ad in front of you.  It's simple and does not waste time scrolling through 100's of items!  (Ugh) Love that the actual ad is there!  Other apps gave me a headache scrolling!  THANKS.  Keeping it simple is great!

I don't see how anyone can find this hard to use, you put in your zipcode and choose the stores you want to save from a list.  Yes, it is the stores weekly ads, but you get them all in one place and, you can get them after midnight on Saturday, long before the paper is at your door. It clearly says 'Weekly sales ads' in its title, not sure how they could have made it any clearer Aaron! I also have no problem in zooming in once I open an ad. Wish it was the same on all tablets though.

title: Dealert - Track Product Sales and Deals
description:
Dealert is a deal-tracking application that scours the web automatically to ensure you never miss a deal again.  Dealert's innovative product tracking system allows you to add an unlimited amount of products to keep an eye on, and will periodically search the internet automatically to find a deal for that product.  When it finds one, you'll be notified immediately to stay ahead of the rest and ensure you never miss a deal.

Rather browse instead?  Dealert curates and aggregates deals from all over the web and allows you to peruse the latest each day.

SUPPORTED DEAL SITES:
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Slickdeals
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Techbargains
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Dealnews
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ BensBargains
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ DealsPlus
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ eDealInfo
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Newegg
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Fabulessly Frugal
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Subreddit r/BuildAPCSales
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Subreddit r/GameDeals
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ ... many more to come!

If you have any questions, need support, have an awesome feature idea, or just want to say hi, you can use the built-in feedback mechanism to get in touch to help continuously improve Dealert over time.

I truly hope you enjoy Dealert.   =)

title: Onsight Mobile Sales App
description:
The Onsight mobile sales app helps improve sales performance by speeding up the ordering process. Save costs by eliminating paper catalogues and paper sales orders. Use your mobile device to show new products to customers and to quickly create orders whilst on the road, even when you are offline. 

Showcase your products using a glossy, visually-appealing electronic product catalogue. Easily manage and sync your customer information using your mobile device. Onsight is used by manufacturers, wholesalers and distributors with outside sales teams to make their outside sales reps more productive.

Mobile Product Catalogue
* Create an online catalogue with 1000s of your products
* Each product has full product specification and an in-depth description
* Bulk upload all of your products within minutes using an easy, pre-formatted Excel spreadsheet
* Download your mobile product catalogue into a PDF format for email and print purposes
* Changes to products are immediately visible on all connected mobile devices when synced

Electronic Product Brochures
* Convert existing printed brochures into electronic brochures
* Tap products to see instant details about each item
* Add items to an order from within the electronic brochure

Quotes and Orders
* Create orders and quotes while on-site at client premises
* Let customers browse the catalogue and self-order
* Add items to an order or quote from your electronic product catalogue as you go
* Create PDF documents of both quotes and orders to immediately send to clients for approval
* Full order history always on hand from any mobile device connected to the Onsight app

Accounts and Contacts
* All customer information is stored in a shared cloud database
* Update account or contact information from any connected mobile device
* Allocate entire accounts to specific sales agents
* Changes to contacts or accounts details are immediately synced once made

Visually-appealing electronic catalogue
* Impress clients with high-quality product images
* Present important product details with the tap of a finger
* Zoom in on product details in high definition

Save time and money
* Get rid of unnecessary paper usage and save the environment
* No more printing costs and no more embarrassing spelling errors on printed catalogues
* Update your catalogue whenever you want ‚Äì no more need for expensive print jobs because of one change
* Update your mobile sales team with product changes immediately

Instant orders and quotes
* Deals can be closed with clients on site
* Clients receive urgent quotes and orders immediately
* Integrate with your accounting system

Real-time sales monitoring
* Monitor your sales team‚Äôs movements via real-time sales reporting from the Onsight app dashboard
* Identify potential problems and issues as soon as they occur

No need to buy additional mobile devices.

All information entered onto the app is seamlessly synced via the cloud.

Works on any tablet: Android, iPad and Windows.

Versions are available for both 7- and 10-inch tablets.

title: Sales System
description:
Sales System is an app for owners of shops and for everyone who needs to keep a simple record of goods.

Sales System Pro - multi-user beta version for chain stores. Your stores can work in the App all day long even without¬† Internet, off-line. Internet will only need to exchange data, for example, once a day. Even a slow internet connection is sufficient. https://play.google.com/apps/testing/pro.sales_system.m_systems.sales_system_pro

You can
- work with products (set prices, barcodes) 
- register Purchases and Sales on your POS (Point of Sale)
- do Revaluation and Inventory scanning and searching products by barcode
- have detailed reports. You always know when and what you bought and sold. Reports on 
  the stock, sales, profit and margin percent 
- save documents and reports to external files.

3 MB only. Even if your Internet connection is slow you download it quickly.

title: Shopify POS ‚Äî Point of Sale
description:
Ideal for business owners who sell occasionally at fairs, markets, and pop-up shops. Easily sell your products and accept payments anywhere right from your Android device. Use it with any Shopify plan. No matter where the sale happens, your orders, inventory, and customers are automatically updated on your Shopify store.
 
WHY CHOOSE SHOPIFY POS:
‚Ä¢ Start selling as soon as you download the app
‚Ä¢ Securely accept cash and credit
‚Ä¢ Attract more business by offering discounts 
‚Ä¢ Email and text receipts directly to your customer
‚Ä¢ Sync products with your online store and other sales channels
‚Ä¢ Create new products and add product photos right from your camera or gallery
‚Ä¢ Set up sales taxes based on location automatically
‚Ä¢ Issue refunds on the spot
‚Ä¢ Accept customized purchases without affecting your existing inventory
 
STAY ORGANIZED
‚Ä¢ View your online and physical store inventory all in one place
‚Ä¢ Get a warning when products are out of stock so you can plan ahead 
‚Ä¢ Track customer orders and sales made on external terminals 
‚Ä¢ Add customized notes and attach customer details to orders
 
KEEP PAYMENTS SIMPLE
‚Ä¢ Securely accept cash and credit cards no matter where you are in the US. Our card reader can be used with Shopify Payments.
‚Ä¢ Process all credit cards at the same rate, with no hidden fees, for as low as 2.4% + 0¬¢ with Shopify Payments
 
LOG INTO SHOPIFY.COM TO:
‚Ä¢ Sell online, in person, and on your favorite social channels in minutes
‚Ä¢ Manage your orders, products, and customers in one place
‚Ä¢ View sales, reports, and analytics about your business 
‚Ä¢ Choose from hundreds of apps to help with marketing, shipping, accounting, and more
 
LANGUAGES
English, Spanish
 
QUESTIONS/FEEDBACK?
Call us at 1-888-678-9481 for 24/7 support. You can also contact us at Shopify Support (https://support.shopify.com/), or visit the Shopify Help Center (https://help.shopify.com/manual/sell-in-person/mobile).

title: Zahomy - Product catalogue maker & online sales
description:
Zahomy app is your pocket sales assistant and catalogue(catalog) maker app.

Use this app to make product catalogues in minutes, complete with a website for selling your products online. Your customers can easily add items to cart or reply with the specific products they want to buy on WhatsApp.

Languages supported:
1). English
2). French
3). Spanish
4). Portuguese. 

This app is for:
1). Selling your products online.
2). Sharing the product catalogues to your customers on WhatsApp, SMS & other apps.
3). Receivng cart orders and the communicating directly with customers.
4). Managing your stock inventory with ease.
5). See shop visits report. 
6). Your team to have the same synchronised catalogues.

Catalogues sharing formats:
i). Images with watermark
ii). Your webshop link
iii). PDF brochure

Main Features
üì≤ Create catalogues
Select multiple images to create a catalogue. Set product details details and let the app do the rest.

üè¨ Your online shop
Your online shop is automatically created for you so customers can see them and get in touch with you on what they like.

üè¨ Receive cart orders from customers
Customers add items to cart, checkout then you will receive notification via app, WhatsApp and email.

üìß Sales receipts
Automatically send sales receipts to customer after sales via WhatsApp or email.

üì¶ Manage your stock with ease
Set stock quantity for each product, variants and manage inventory.

title: Sales & Marketing Skills
description:
What are the best skills to include on your resume? Which skill set will help you get hired? Do you know the difference between hard skills and soft skills? How can you share your skills, expertise, and accomplishments with prospective employers? As well as providing a history of your experience, your resume is the perfect place to highlight your strengths and abilities.

When you're adding skills to your resume or reviewing the skills required for a job you're interested in, there are two types of skills that are relevant.

Soft skills are the skills that apply to every job. These are your people skills - interpersonal skills, communication skills, and other qualities that enable you to be successful in the workplace.

Hard skills are the qualifications required to do the job. For example, computer skills, administrative skills, or customer service skills. Find out more about the difference between hard and soft skills and how to Include top skills employers want on a resume.

You'll need a variety of skills to be successful in a sales role, and you will need to be able to demonstrative those skills to prospective employers.

comments: Edit: 2.24.20- The app has SO many issues lately! Nothing will load multiple times a day, I'm not receiving notifications half the time for messages or Interests in my items. Absolutely causing issues for sales and buys. I was obsessed and impressed with the app for a very long while. I'm almost over it now with all the issues!

I love this app for many reasons! 1) I can sell my unwanted items without leaving the house. 2) I can buy an item without having to wait in line at a store; too many times it took so long that I just put the item back and left. 3) Porch pick up (PPU) is great, especially if you have kids! 4) Last but not least, you get to meet great people and be part of a good community!

I love this app, find it useful for finding great local deals! It would be better if the messages showed up right away instead of only when the page is physically refreshed or restarted, and if the search engine would have filters, search within price range etc. Still would reccomend to friends though.

Nice to have a place to buy good used items. But it's very frustrating if you forget your password login. I did and clicked to send email to reset several times and didn't get email to reset. I finally figured out my password on my own. Now I have no notifications updating on the app. Nothing new showing in the last 24 hours?!

I absolutely love love love this App. It's the best way to get rid of your unwanted clutter. It's all local and would recommend this app to everyone. Also if you are looking to purchase things, they have just about anything you can think of. And the people are very friendly.

title: Sales skills to master
description:
The best sales teams are a lot like great schools: They care about results, but the way they achieve them is by being relentless about developing the inside sales skills of their reps. In fact, the best sales teams are most often led by someone who is more like a sales coach than a sales manager. This dedication to developing inside sales skills ultimately creates a sales team that not only hits its short-term goals, but instills a culture of learning and self-improvement in order to achieve its long-term goals as well.

But it‚Äôs not always so easy. Superb inside sales skills don‚Äôt always come naturally to young reps, and sales leaders often feel like they don‚Äôt have the time or mastery to adequately coach their reps. We know how important this process is, though, so we boiled everything down to the 14 inside sales skills every sales rep must master.

title: PipeCycle CRM - Sales Pipeline & Lead management
description:
PipeCycle "CRM" is a self-explanatory & easy to use "Sales Pipeline management‚Äù & "Lead Management" app for Individuals and Sales Teams of any size.

PipeCycle is a mobile-first CRM / Lead Management App with powerful features. Need of the hour is NOT an overloaded feature-rich app, but a simple yet powerful app having the right number of features ensuring ‚ÄúNot a single lead goes out of sight‚Äù and not a single follow-up opportunity is missed.

PipeCycle CRM gives you quick links which display your 
1. Today's followups
2. Overdue followups
3. Complete Pipeline (with how much your pipeline is worth!)
4. Starred Customers/Leads (Important ones can be 'starred')
5. Calendar view of followups for the whole month :

So that you can manage your pipeline on the go.

Following are some of the features in PipeCycle CRM:

1. Create Leads
2. Follow-up with leads
3. Push notifications
4. Calendar view of follow-ups for the month
5. Pipeline end-to-end view 
6. Generate and send Price estimates easily
7. Total worth of your Pipeline
8. Multiple Outlets/Branches/Groups
9. Create Admins and Users
10. Complete Lead History
11. Attach multiple files to leads
12. Monthly/Quarterly targets for sales teams
13. Compare Target v/s Achieved
14. Team performance overview
15. Mark Important leads and a dedicated screen showing 
starred leads
16. Add labels/tags to leads and search leads by labels/tags
17. Make calls / Send SMSs from the app

You will be able to do much more with this app, for ex: A comprehensive report of your activities can be sent to your supervisor/manager on just click of a button.

Upcoming versions of our app will have:

1. Business card scanning
2. Lead Scoring
and more

Download the app and register now! 

Note: Only one registration is needed for a company. Registered user can add any number of their team members as users in PipeCycle.

If you need help, you can write to us at crm@pipecyclecrm.com

comments: Very Nice CRM App For Customer Follow ups and it is a Pipe for reach you sales traget as well. Thank you.
It's a great app, with all the features you need to improve your sales team, and the support is also on point.

The easiest CRM app I found on playstore. It shows almost all infornation I want on pipeline screen and navigation is very simple. Managing my leads and also my sales team is so easy. Folowup Reminders help a lot. My team members can send their weekly reports just by clicking a button. I would recommend this to anyone who is looking for a hassle free CRM at very affordable price.

fraud app. i submitted some of my leads after installing it. and now when I opened it is giving the message that i will have to pay them for subscription. all of my leads and data has lost. it should be clearly mentioned before installing that users have to pay. don't install it.
After all kinds of research I settled with PipeCycle. Fits my requirement. Very easy to use. Has all features needed for sales teams. Please Consider adding Team Chat and Quotation/estimate module.

title: Valomnia -Sales & Distribution
description:
Valomnia is a Mobile Cloud Software made for Suppliers & Manufacturers to help them grow their Sales in Retail Stores and optimize their Distribution Process

Valomnia is a solution made to improve operational efficiency in Direct Store Delivery (DSD), Sales, Ordering Processes, providing simple, ergonomic and business oriented apps for its users.

Save time
‚Ä¢ Reduce your direct & indirect costs (avoid massive use of paperwork, ‚Ä¶)
‚Ä¢ No need to bring all your catalog with you to each appointment.
‚Ä¢ Edit an order & have it signed directly on tablet.

Give a better brand image to your company
‚Ä¢ Works Offline & Online

Customizable catalog
‚Ä¢ Possibility to browse by product categories & by product reference
‚Ä¢ Better presentation of products categorized by brand & or by category.
‚Ä¢ Know the most viewed products & your customers favorite products
‚Ä¢ Build a dynamic & modern corporate image.
‚Ä¢ Upload and present Products Videos.

Taking order & order management
‚Ä¢ Real-time inventory
‚Ä¢ History of order taking
‚Ä¢ Special offers
‚Ä¢ Export & share order
‚Ä¢ Print order & quotes

Easy to use
‚Ä¢ Quick catalog setup (possibility to import CSV files)
‚Ä¢ Quick customers list setup (possibility to import CSV files)
‚Ä¢ Valomnia Sales, products catalog, order taking app & CRM requires no technical expertise.
‚Ä¢ Access to sales information wherever you are.
‚Ä¢ Valomnia Sales is available in English and French.

Reports & analytics
‚Ä¢ Account dashboard with charts & statistics
‚Ä¢ Order statistics & history
‚Ä¢ Products statistics & reports
‚Ä¢ Easy export to Excel file
‚Ä¢ Agents statistics
‚Ä¢ Automatic Reports generator
‚Ä¢ Reports based on customer‚Äôs feedback

Rapid return on investment
‚Ä¢ Any sales transaction will be completed with signatures on tablet
‚Ä¢ Valomnia Sales helps your sales reps acknowledge their position in terms of their objectives and therefore identify the actual number of visits and turnover achieved.

Cost reduction
‚Ä¢ Reduce paperwork on order taking & catalog printing

Efficient Sales meetings
‚Ä¢ Improve sales in mobility (preparing visits, Geo location, customer history, statistics)
‚Ä¢ Have all your data at hand to prepare your appointment.

Merchandising
‚Ä¢ With Valomnia, your sales reps, Van sellers or merchandisers can report key marketing information through configurable questionnaires and perform audits on products planograms and POS advertising


For more details, you can visit our website http://valomnia.com/

title: Bookkeeping & Inventory Management. Sales tracker
description:
The best free book keeper app, inventory accounting, sales and purchase order tracking. Boss also includes financial management: cash flow, expenses control, debits and credits ledger book.

Accounting and bookkeeping at the tip of your fingers are what Boss is all about. Easy offline and online Debit-Credit bookkeeping, also for inventory, sales and customer management. Boss is the best accounting app for small businesses. Not only because of its financial and stock management proficiency, but also because this app inculcates CRM. Download and use it now for free and get its full application package and all functionalities on your device. With Boss, all you need is your smartphone and your business can be managed by you, anywhere and anytime.

Book keeping has never been so simple.

Currently, there is a free version of this app with no limitations to the number of items or possible transactions.

You will be able to use your mobile device to:
- Buy or sell goods and services (retail, wholesale, store credit, Debt, Cash).
- Maintain inventory records and generate price lists.
- Maintain and manage your stock and ledger accounts.
- Create and share price lists with your wholesale customers.
- Receive and spend money in any currency.
- Conduct mutual settlements with customers, suppliers, and other partners.
- Record inventory counts and revaluation of stock.
- Add a barcode and a photo to any product and scan barcodes with your device‚Äôs camera.
- Estimate/control your expenses and profitability. 
- Print and share documents directly from the app.
- Customize and make flexible reports with the drill-down feature. Generate any kind of report in just a few seconds: sales report, debt report, balance report, cost-of-sales, profit and loss report, and so on.
- Use it offline and it will synchronize automatically when the network is available.

Boss takes away the unnecessary expenses on business software, barcode scanners or computers. With book keeper Boss, all you need is your smartphone. Be in charge and in control of your business and finances with Boss, now!

Paid features included in Boss bookkeeper are as follows:
- A web-version where you can import your opening balances. 
- Flexibility to work from several devices.
- Multiuser mode with different user roles (The Cashier and The Owner. The Owner can choose the number of functions available for the Cashiers).
- Multi-currency option. It allows you to run transactions with your customers in multiple currencies at the same time.
- Purchase and sales orders.

https://boss-app.com/en/price
https://boss-app.com/
https://www.facebook.com/likeaboss.pro/
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCSSuNbSPHybHAkcFJA73-mA/videos


Terms of use - https://boss-app.com/en/terms-of-use
Privacy policy - https://boss-app.com/en/privacy-policy
Created on 1C platform

title: Sales Play POS Plus - Point of Sale
description:
‚ÄúSales Play‚Äù is a perfect POS solution for any kind of business. Your business may be a cafe, bar, restaurant, coffee shop, beauty salon, food truck, car wash, book store or any other business. You may have more than one outlet which you want to manage online, Sales Play POS is the solution.  

Install ‚ÄúSales Play‚Äù to your Tablet or Phone and convert it into a complete Smart POS today.

Sales Play app is with no ads, no contracts, no credit cards, and no commitments.

You can replace your conventional cash register and billing system with Sales Play POS and start tracking sales and inventory in real time. Create items, view sales/ inventory reports, manage multiple stores in the cloud web portal. 

Sales Play supports with many printers. You can simply connect Bluetooth, Cable, Wi-Fi or USB printer. 

Some of the Main Areas 

1. INVOICING / BILLING 
‚Ä¢ Work offline 
‚Ä¢ Both Landscape and Portrait Interfaces 
‚Ä¢ Items Display with Images or without images
‚Ä¢ Number keypad option
‚Ä¢ Bill Split
‚Ä¢ Full control over pricing/Qty/Taxes/Discounts (item vs full value)
‚Ä¢ Easy access to the important interfaces via MORE button
‚Ä¢ Comprehensive Payment Interface
‚Ä¢ Clear information visibility 
‚Ä¢ Multi Payments 
‚Ä¢ Send Receipt via email


2. SALES MANAGEMENT 
‚Ä¢ View past invoices and re-print 
‚Ä¢ Manage Drawer Transactions & Reasons
‚Ä¢ Issue & cancel credit note
‚Ä¢ Credit settlement option
‚Ä¢ Manage other Charges ( Ex. Service/Delivery etc) 
‚Ä¢ Order types ( Ex. Dining/Take away)
‚Ä¢ Manage employee details ( can be attached to bill when needed)
‚Ä¢ Currency in the bill ( manage multiple currencies and issue the bill) 
‚Ä¢ Cash notes (manage the payment interface with needed cash notes)


3. INVENTORY MANAGEMENT 
‚Ä¢ Add/modify/delete Products 
‚Ä¢ Bundling (Bundle few products and create one product. Ex. Promotion) 
‚Ä¢ Manage tax (Create tax codes and attached with products Ex. GST/VAT)
‚Ä¢ Manage product categories 
‚Ä¢ Price change (Individual or bulk)
‚Ä¢ Add Stock- GRN (Individual or bulk)
‚Ä¢ Return stocks 
‚Ä¢ Transfer stocks ( Transfer within locations)
‚Ä¢ Manage suppliers and issue purchase orders 


4. CUSTOMER MANAGEMENT  
‚Ä¢ Create Customers (Fill the profile even with image)   
‚Ä¢ Run Loyalty Program
‚Ä¢ Create agents ( can be attached to invoices when needed)
‚Ä¢ Record customer feedback
‚Ä¢ Record customer orders 
‚Ä¢ Connect social media inside the app

5. REPORTS  
‚Ä¢ Past invoices & Daily Sales 
‚Ä¢ Revenue Reports & Cashier wise reports 
‚Ä¢ Stock Movements 
‚Ä¢ Credit Note reports 
‚Ä¢ Settlement Reports
‚Ä¢ User Access reports 
‚Ä¢ Etc.

WEB BASED BACK OFFICE 
- Complete Reports and Analytics 
- Manage Items 
- Manage Stocks
- Create Loyalty Programs
- Manage Terminals 
- Manage Users   

========================================================================

For more details about hardware please visit 

https://www.salesplaypos.com/purchase/

For the resellers, please contact us for partnerships via

sales@salesplaypos.com

We are always welcome your suggestions and happy to help you.
