title: Onsight Mobile Sales App 3.0
description:
The Onsight mobile sales app helps improve sales performance by speeding up the ordering process. Save costs by eliminating paper catalogues and paper sales orders. Use your mobile device to show new products to customers and to quickly create orders whilst on the road, even when you are offline. 

Showcase your products using a glossy, visually-appealing electronic product catalogue. Easily manage and sync your customer information using your mobile device. Onsight is used by manufacturers, wholesalers and distributors with outside sales teams to make their outside sales reps more productive.

Mobile Product Catalogue
* Create an online catalogue with 1000s of your products
* Each product has full product specification and an in-depth description
* Bulk upload all of your products within minutes using an easy, pre-formatted Excel spreadsheet
* Download your mobile product catalogue into a PDF format for email and print purposes
* Changes to products are immediately visible on all connected mobile devices when synced

Electronic Product Brochures
* Convert existing printed brochures into electronic brochures
* Tap products to see instant details about each item
* Add items to an order from within the electronic brochure

Quotes and Orders
* Create orders and quotes while on-site at client premises
* Let customers browse the catalogue and self-order
* Add items to an order or quote from your electronic product catalogue as you go
* Create PDF documents of both quotes and orders to immediately send to clients for approval
* Full order history always on hand from any mobile device connected to the Onsight app

Accounts and Contacts
* All customer information is stored in a shared cloud database
* Update account or contact information from any connected mobile device
* Allocate entire accounts to specific sales agents
* Changes to contacts or accounts details are immediately synced once made

Visually-appealing electronic catalogue
* Impress clients with high-quality product images
* Present important product details with the tap of a finger
* Zoom in on product details in high definition

Save time and money
* Get rid of unnecessary paper usage and save the environment
* No more printing costs and no more embarrassing spelling errors on printed catalogues
* Update your catalogue whenever you want ‚Äì no more need for expensive print jobs because of one change
* Update your mobile sales team with product changes immediately

Instant orders and quotes
* Deals can be closed with clients on site
* Clients receive urgent quotes and orders immediately
* Integrate with your accounting system

Real-time sales monitoring
* Monitor your sales team‚Äôs movements via real-time sales reporting from the Onsight app dashboard
* Identify potential problems and issues as soon as they occur

No need to buy additional mobile devices.

All information entered onto the app is seamlessly synced via the cloud.

Works on any Android and iOS device.

title: Sales Representative Free
description:
The application is aimed to the representative, commercial agent, promoter and similar.
The application's purpose is to simplify and facilitate the user in customer management, and track visits to customers as well as offering a number of tools to the analysis of the work.
Some of the main features:
- Import / Export and price lists management *
- * Import / Export and customers management
- Ability to geo-locate the customer or to navigate it (requires Google Maps and Google Navigator) *
- Managing customer visits
- Placing an order and the order report generation in PDF* format.
- Sharing of the order and customer card *
- Ability to enter appointments in your Google calendar.
- Statistical analysis of visits and orders (via charts) *
- Function Agenda for quick viewing of visits with ability to enable multiple filters and view the status of these (open / closed, expired, etc. ..)

- Ability to add images from this visit (disputes, showrooms, etc ..)
- Ability to export the visits data in XML format compatible with the layout of different management (eg. Danea Easy Fatt) *
- Possibility to make a backup of data

* Some functions are unique to the full version "Sales Agent"

title: Inventory,Purchase,Sales Order
description:
Top rated Android App with 100,000+ customer downloads
Major Modules:

1) Inventory Management
2) Purchase Order, Sales Order (Email / SMS Orders from mobile)
3) Suppliers, Customers
4) Import Data, Export Data, automatic data backup.
5) Extensive Reporting
6) Income and Expense Management
7) Barcode integrated 

This App provides stock-taking and inventory management in most simplistic way. Be it for your home inventory or for the business inventory; it will help you easily track your inventory. It also helps in managing purchase orders and sales orders. You can send those to suppliers or customers. Do your income and expense management along with inventory management. So, it is a complete app to run your business from mobile or your home inventory.

- Record your inventory data in a minimalistic manner
- Maintain stock IN / OUT movements and get extensive reporting on that
- Receive low inventory alerts by emails or in-app notifications
- Barcode search and direct item addition
- Run stock-taking for your inventory and get variance reporting
- Create purchase orders; and email or SMS them to suppliers instantly
- Record delivery of purchase orders. That will increase your inventory automatically
- Create sales orders; and email or SMS them to customers instantly
- Record delivery of sales orders. That will reduce your inventory automatically
- Export / import your inventory data in Excel/CSV and setup daily/weekly/monthly auto-back up of your data
- Store the location and image of the inventory items
- Know your inventory valuation in real time, which is auto-calculated using weighted average inventory valuation method
- Get extensive reporting: Inventory valuation report, Purchase Order Report, Sales Order Report,  Supplier / Customer report, Location report, Daily/Monthly/Date Range Inventory transactions, ‚Ä¶..
- Export all reports to excel and get them in email

As a retailer, you need to keep track of your inventory, need to organize it and know when to replenish it. Instant Inventory App allows you to keep detailed records of your inventory on your mobile device as well as update stock movement in real time. Create, manage or control your item stock lists, scroll of articles, part lists, equipment serial numbers, physical or fixed assets etc. in no time at all. Reporting module offers a handful of reports to meet your reporting needs. The alert system raises alerts if the inventory is below permissible quantity.

Feel free to contact us via email. We have excellent support record and no questions will be ignored ‚Äì instant.inventory@billionhands.in

Official Website: http://www.billionhands.in/InstantInventory.html
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uJmx2YdIc0I
Follow us on Google Plus: https://plus.google.com/117788912595860400806 

Download app now & manage inventory on your fingertips.

comments: This app is awesome. a little tricky figuring out how to add products at first. but once i figured that out its smooth sailing. watch the help videos before you uninstall this app thinking you cant add products. i almost did that. and almost left a bad review. but luckily i saw the link for the help videos. I'd give it 6 stars if I could.

A very useful app with one exception. It needs to be able to track assembly of product. You make a product that requires more than one part to make a new part from your stock of parts, there is no way to put them together as final part in inventory except to subtract from each sub part then add to final part number. This is time consuming. It would be great if the app could do this auto, like a sales order but instead of just taking parts out it could add the finished part to inventory.
I used and liked this app. But now that I no longer use it, I cannot get them to stop charging me. They just keep taking payments and won't respond to me to remedy this.

I see it's simple/minimalistic attributes. However, I still find it complex, for instance when creating an item it doesn't have the option for entering 'cost price' and 'selling price' instead it uses an 'average price' wc is a turn off for me,... Edit: one more star üåü for response I Edit 2: pls what is the difference BTW this app and the inventory plus app | Edit 3: pls can an option for returns and exchange be added to the app?

Best one I have used, A++ to them on customer service! They helled me with a lot of modifications to my account. I only have one issue with it and that it takes the time from their servers and not from the local device so I have to to keep reminding myself to adjust the times. I can't wait to see what the next updat will bring.

title: Sales Management
description:
You are the owner of a fashion shop, electronic shops, equipment and materials for furniture...?
Number of fee and profit make you headache?
You want to track quantity of sold products, expenses, inventory, customer ...?

There are hundreds of reasons to want to find a management software

Sales Management is a great solution for you, completely free suit most businesses. It suits for small and medium shops/stores.

Why is the Sales Management?
1. Ease to use: Sales Management is designed to be the easiest to use, no need to go through training. You don't need to know anything about computer but you can use Store Management without issue.
2. Compact: you will get rid of a jumble: CPU, monitor, mouse, keyboard ... on your desk. All things you need just a tablet (and printer), your desk will bring a more modern style. Especially Store management can fully connect the printer via wireless (bluetooth - upcomming)
3. Convenience: if you need attach pictures to your products, you will not need to buy a camera or miscellaneous steps to connect the computer to the camera.
Forget about it, Store Management will support these hassle things, simply open the product management features, creating a new product, then you can enjoy taking pictures of the product from camera of your tablet.
Pictures will be attached to each product.
4. Management of complex products: each product you have dozens attached information (eg phone has information of screen size, CPU, RAM ... Clothes have color, material. ..)
Sales Management is strong enough to help you configure and attach these information to your products. Store management also support manage product as categories.
5. Effective Customer Management: tracking of assets, purchase history ...
6. Cost management: create new cost, cost classification. You can attach a bill on new cost item
7. Report easy to use: you can create dozens of different types of reports with extremely simple operation.
8. Support Online
9. Work as offline (and online - upcomming)

All comments are extremely valuable for us to improve the program further.

Web: https://salemanagement.vn
Email: support@salemanagement.vn
Phone: +84902428723 (Mr. Loc)

Sincerely

title: Sales Goals Tracker
description:
App to track your Sales Amount & Goals.
You can set your Target values and update the actual values as you achieve them.

Main modules:
a) Sales Tracking - you  key in the Monthly Sales Target from Jan to Dec for the year. Then you provide the actual monthly sales throughout the year. Once you enter the values,  the app will calculate and check the difference between the Actual and Target amount. It will give you the percentage achieved. Can also view in a chart.

b) Sales Pattern - you enter the past 3 years sales records. App will calculate the average amount and show the past sales percentage per month. With your new target values, you will get different target values based on past patterns. Can also view in a chart.

c) Qualifier Points - Enter your Jan, Feb, Mar & Apr target sales values. App will calculate the Sales values, extra points (default to 30% of sales) and Bonus points (based on sales amount). You can track what are your qualified points including the Extra and Bonus points.

d) Goals Breakdown - Make your goals smaller from Yearly, monthly, weekly to daily targets.

e) Sales Target Breakdown - Calculate the Cases, Presentations, Appointments and Leads required by monthly, weekly and daily to achieve your yearly income.

f) Dream Board - Select your favorite pictures  to visualize your dreams.

g) Motivation Video - Select videos to motivate yourself easily.

h) Affirmation Pictures - Select your favorite pictures and affirm you motivation.

i) Affirmation Phrases - Edit and add your own favorite affirmation  phrases. You can listen to your device reading the affirmation to you.

The information and values you entered and edited are saved into your phone. You can view the data again after you close and reopen the app.

App to track your Sales Amount & Goals.
You can set your Target values and update the actual values as you achieve them.

Main modules:
a) Sales Tracking - you key in the Monthly Sales Target from Jan to Dec for the year. Then you provide the actual monthly sales throughout the year. Once you enter the values, the app will calculate and check the difference between the Actual and Target amount. It will give you the percentage achieved. Can also view in a chart.

b) Sales Pattern - you enter the past 3 years sales records. App will calculate the average amount and show the past sales percentage per month. With your new target values, you will get different target values based on past patterns. Can also view in a chart.

c) Qualifier Points - Enter your Jan, Feb, Mar & Apr target sales values. App will calculate the Sales values, extra points (default to 30% of sales) and Bonus points (based on sales amount). You can track what are your qualified points including the Extra and Bonus points.

d) Goals Breakdown - Make your goals smaller from Yearly, monthly, weekly to daily targets.

e) Sales Target Breakdown - Calculate the Cases, Presentations, Appointments and Leads required by monthly, weekly and daily to achieve your yearly income.

f) Dream Board - Select your favorite pictures to visualize your dreams.

g) Motivation Video - Select videos to motivate yourself easily.

h) Affirmation Pictures - Select your favorite pictures and affirm you motivation.

i) Affirmation Phrases - Edit and add your own favorite affirmation phrases. You can listen to your device reading the affirmation to you.

The information and values you entered and edited are saved into your phone. You can view the data again after you close and reopen the app.
summary: App to Track Sales Goals with Dream Board, Breakdowns & Performance Pattern.
recentChanges: Added icons for buttons. Added Speech for Affirmation phrases. Now you can listen your device reading the affirmation to you.
comments: yuk

title: Advanced Selling Podcast
description:
Bringing you weekly episodes of the Advanced Selling Show, hosted by Bill Caskey and Bryan Neale. Each week, Bill and Bryan add selling skills to your tool kit by giving you access to both their thinking and their solutions for clients.

One week the topic might be lead generation; another week it might be closing skills; and yet another week they could rant on communicating value, or talking about money with a prospect, or how to handle problems preemptively in the sales process.

But regardless of the topic, Bill and Bryan bring a pragmatic, thoughtful (and sometimes humorous) approach to sales and sales problems. They also answer questions that listeners pose from call-ins or emails.

In addition to access to the show, this App gives you access to special features like:

*PDF documents ‚Äì covering Sales Tips and special reports that they offer ONLY for App clients
*Wallpaper
*Bonus audio and video content on Premium Weeks
*Following the show‚Äôs Twitter feed
*Call-in audio comments.
*Email us Questions

If you are in sales--or own a business that relies on sales and marketing, and are looking to get the most out of your phone ‚Äì this App is perfect.

SPECIAL OFFERS
Occasionally, Bill and Bryan will create special offers for phone clients.

(Please note, not all features are available for all episodes.)

title: CUKE - Sales, Stock and Cashflow Management
description:
Retire your old sales ledger! Make your life easier and boost your sales!

CUKE is the ideal app to manage your sales, inventory and customers.
Used in more that 90 countries by thousands of users, CUKE helps you to organize your entire business!
Developed especially for freelancers, resellers, micro-entrepreneurs and all professionals who work with direct sales.
Managing of your sales, products, customers, receivables and results has never been easier!
Through simple and easy-to-use screens, you will have all the control you need for your business.
While you are visiting customers in the field, CUKE works offline too!


CUKE FEATURES
‚òÖ Selling management
‚òÖ Sales management
‚òÖ Customer management
‚òÖ Cellphone contact list import
‚òÖ Salespeople can use it as product catalog
‚òÖ Inventory and stock management
‚òÖ Expenses and Purchases management
‚òÖ Receivables management
‚òÖ Payables management
‚òÖ Financial management
‚òÖ Product image gallery
‚òÖ Sales history control
‚òÖ Purchases history control
‚òÖ Send sale detail through Whatsapp
‚òÖ Multi currency (in Android configurations)
‚òÖ Cash flow statement
‚òÖ Partial payments and installments
‚òÖ Debtors Management
‚òÖ Creditors Management
‚òÖ Access security
‚òÖ Financial, sales and purchases reports


CUKE TUTORIALS
Sign up for our YouTube channel and watch several tutorials that will help you get the most from CUKE. Every week we publish a new video for you.

http://youtube.com/c/cukeapp


OPTIONAL SERVICES
CUKE is free*! In addition to it, you can count on optional services being a CUKE Pro subscriber.

‚òÖ Your data on cloud - Have your sales, inventory, products, customers data saved on world-class servers.
‚òÖ Product sharing by WhatsApp - Create groups, show off your products via WhatsApp to your customers and increase your sales (ideal for resellers).
‚òÖ Invoices - Send a sales invoice to your client by Whatsapp or other messaging app.
‚òÖ Receipts - Sent a payment receipt to your client by Whatsapp or other messaging app.
‚òÖ (Soon) Device Synchronization - Use the same CUKE account on more than one device.
‚òÖ Web Product Catalog - Show off and manage your products on CUKE using your personal computer.
Check our plans at http://cukeapp.com


IT‚ÄôS FOR YOU
CUKE is for you, individual entrepreneur, self employed professional, sales agent, small business owner, independent sales representative, or direct salespeople.
It is for resellers and retailers in general.
We strive to make your life easier. That's why we're constantly improving CUKE, and we really appreciate your ideas and feedback!


WHY USE CUKE
‚òÖ CUKE is free *
‚òÖ Know your receivables and payables beforehand
‚òÖ Closely monitor your business results
‚òÖ Effectively track your cash flow
‚òÖ Improve your financial control
‚òÖ Boost your sales
‚òÖ Keep an eye on your inventory
‚òÖ Have control of your collections
‚òÖ Track and learn from your sales history
‚òÖ Ideal for showing off products with image galleries
‚òÖ Indispensable for you entrepreneur, micro-entrepreneur, freelancer, small business owner, resellers who need sales management, inventory control, customers and cash flow, all organized in their hands.

* some limitations apply

CUSTOMER CARE
We are people who really care about listening and helping you so that you stay focused on what you do best: selling!
If you are face with a problem or have any doubt, please contact us through Messenger https://m.me/cukeapp.
We respond to all messages without exception :)


Facebook Fanpage: http://facebook.com/cukeapp
CUKE website: https://www.cukeapp.com
Privacy Policy and Terms of Use: https://www.cukeapp.com/user/termospolitica?lang=en
About us: http://www.kiwano.com.br

title: My Business
description:
My business is an application for small business administration where you only have a point of sale. This application has an inventory section where you can add your products (possibility to use barcode reader), update them and check the products that are in their minimum quantity.
It also has a section to manage sales, purchases, revenue and extra expenses. Generate reports and graphs.
You can create receipts for sales, in addition to creating sales receivables.

title: Stock & Sales Manager
description:
Stock & Sales Manager application can keep stock information of your products, make stock exit and stock entry and sell your products. You can examine your income and profit status with detailed graphs.

Features
‚Ä¢ Stock Tracking
‚Ä¢ Stock In and Stock Out
‚Ä¢ Stock Movements
‚Ä¢ Stock Change Chart
‚Ä¢ Product Profit and Income Graph
‚Ä¢ Product Update
‚Ä¢ Product Sales
‚Ä¢ Sales Movements
‚Ä¢ Sales Returns
‚Ä¢ Income and Profit Graphs
‚Ä¢ Tops Section
‚Ä¢ Backup and Restore
‚Ä¢ Advanced Settings
‚Ä¢ Material Design

STOCK TRACKING
You can register your products to the application and then you can enter the stock and exit the stock. You can examine your stock with filters to see which stocks are running out. With the product review, you can examine the data such as stock entry, stock out and product sales and follow the change of your stock with detailed graphics. You can review how much Income and Profit you have earned from the product you want.

SALES MANAGEMENT
You can scan your products with barcode scanner and make sales. You can review your sales in sales transactions section. Sold items can get refund.

PROFIT AND INCOME GRAPHICS
You can see the profit and income amount of each product and examine the graph. You can filter your profit and income data over time and make detailed reviews. If you wish, you can also see the profit and income data from all products in the reporting section.

title: Closing Techniques for Sales
description:
Have you ever been talking to a customer in the showroom, or at their place of business and they have stumped you with an objection that you had not encountered before?  The end result is usually panic, or an uncomfortable silence and no Sale. 

Professional Sales People train constantly to prepare themselves for such encounters, yet there seems to be few applications available for Droid users - Well, here we go.  

This Version is FREE and comes with a limited number of very useful closes - which actually work! 

Written and designed by a Sales Professional FOR Sales Professionals.

title: Listaso Sales Order & Catalog
description:
Viasql is now Listaso!

Listaso Sales is the next generation software or sales force automation, van sales, store calls, merchandising and in-store audits.  No more faxes, phone calls or emails to keep communication between the field and the main office.  Listaso Sales integrates with our web based BackOffice, SAP Business One, Sage / MAS, QuickBooks, QuickBooks POS, QuickBooks Online, Peachtree / Sage50, Acctivate, Zoho Books and other accounting systems.

- Optimizes field efficiency and effectiveness

title: GotoGarageSale - Find Garage Sales & Yard Sales
description:
Find Sales & Items
GotoGarageSale comes with top-notch features which makes it super-easy and convenient for you to find sales or items, all from one place. Following are some of the key features for buyers;

- Find sales near your current location. 
- Find sales by city or zip.
- Find sales by category e.g. Furniture, Clothes, Toys etc.
- Find sales where a certain item is being sold e.g. Cycle, Sofa, Chair.

- Browse sales on map or list.
- Filter sales by day (Today, This Weekend, This Month, Next Month).
- Search for specific keywords to filter the sales.
 
- Get driving directions to each sale.
- Save sales and items to your favorites list for easy access.
- Get notified about upcoming garage sales.

Add Sale
Want to clear old unwanted items from your home? Before you move your items to your yard, move it on GotoGarageSale app. Here‚Äôs what sellers get;

- Publish sale 1-3 months in advance which ensures a greater visibility of your sale and reach maximum audience.
- List sale with items name, photos, price and other details which will be visible to thousands of buyers who loves to get a preview of what will be at the sale.
- Mark an item as sold to let people know that a particular item is not available in sale anymore.

Please note, the in-app purchase is intended to give your sales a priority listing on our platform, where you can publish your sale 2-3 months in advance from your sale date, thus ensuring a greater visibility of your sale to maximum audience.

descriptionHTML:
Find Sales & Items
GotoGarageSale comes with top-notch features which makes it super-easy and convenient for you to find sales or items, all from one place. Following are some of the key features for buyers;

- Find sales near your current location.
- Find sales by city or zip.
- Find sales by category e.g. Furniture, Clothes, Toys etc.
- Find sales where a certain item is being sold e.g. Cycle, Sofa, Chair.

- Browse sales on map or list.
- Filter sales by day (Today, This Weekend, This Month, Next Month).
- Search for specific keywords to filter the sales.

- Get driving directions to each sale.
- Save sales and items to your favorites list for easy access.
- Get notified about upcoming garage sales.

Add Sale
Want to clear old unwanted items from your home? Before you move your items to your yard, move it on GotoGarageSale app. Here‚Äôs what sellers get;

- Publish sale 1-3 months in advance which ensures a greater visibility of your sale and reach maximum audience.
- List sale with items name, photos, price and other details which will be visible to thousands of buyers who loves to get a preview of what will be at the sale.
- Mark an item as sold to let people know that a particular item is not available in sale anymore.

Please note, the in-app purchase is intended to give your sales a priority listing on our platform, where you can publish your sale 2-3 months in advance from your sale date, thus ensuring a greater visibility of your sale to maximum audience.

We are committed to make garage sale process smooth and easy. If you feel there‚Äôs anything that we can improve for a better experience, we‚Äôre always listening. Feel free to email us at contact@gotogaragesale.com

title: Sales Management

title: App4Sales - Sales Rep, Order Taking & Catalog App
description:
Download this amazing sales app which saves you time during your sales process. Visualize your items in a lookbook, easy and time saving. Explore the app for free now!

App4Sales is the perfect app for your sales representatives for quick order taking, used by thousands of sales reps. The integration with your ERP system makes it possible to access the complete customer database and register new customers. Representatives only have access to their own customers with their personal login credentials. Search the digital catalog and use the lookbook to give your customers a good impression of all your items. Add items to the order, load customer-specific price lists and let customers sign the order on your Android device. After sending the order, it will be created automatically in your ERP system. Manually entering orders in your ERP system is no longer necessary with App4Sales.

With App4Sales it is possible to sell items anywhere: at an exhibition, in a showroom or at a customer. Paper order forms are history with App4Sales.

The practical functions of App4Sales
App4Sales has various functions that make it easy to speed up and optimize the sales process:
‚Ä¢ Lookbook with images of your items
‚Ä¢ Digital catalog
‚Ä¢ Fast order registration
‚Ä¢ Search and filter items
‚Ä¢ View customers and catalog in online and offline mode
‚Ä¢ Always have your real-time information at hand; including customer-specific price lists
‚Ä¢ Use barcode scanning for faster input
‚Ä¢ View all stock information, prices, item groups and historical data from your ERP system
‚Ä¢ Use the App4Sales CMS to manage users, content and user rights
‚Ä¢ App4Sales supports the most common languages

title: Tally ERP Sales Order app
description:
An app developed for Tally ERP 9 Users is guaranteed to improve efficiency of your sales person. It Includes Sales Order booking, Outstanding management, customer profiling. 

Sales orders can be entered and managed through Android devices using Sales order booking App. It facilitates faster booking of orders by the sales person from anywhere & anytime. The order booked in the mobile device will automatically get created in the Tally.ERP 9. 

Key Features of Bizeye Sales Order App for Tally

- Create and Manage Sales Orders
- Create Sales Order for multiple stock Items
- Automatic update of the booked Sales orders in Tally.ERP 9
- Facilitate Discount in the Sales Order
- Displays complete profile of customer
- Tracks Outstanding of the Sales Person
- Send Notifications to your Sales Team
- Know Statuses of  Orders booked

The App works only with Tally.ERP 9 and Bizeye Business Server
